apps.title: Pulsara: Medical Communication
apps.description:
During the most critical moments in life, Pulsara® places the power in your hands to build teams and communicate with public safety, public health, and emergency management on the fly. Pulsara unites distributed teams—first responders, emergency medical services, fire departments, hospitals, health systems, behavioral health experts, emergency management, and more—on one scalable communication and logistics platform. From the routine EMS transport to a mass casualty incident, Pulsara’s flexible platform enables teams to standardize workflows and streamline communications for every method of arrival and patient or event type. The result? Decreased treatment times, providers who are empowered to provide better quality of care, reduced provider burnout, and cost and resource savings.

In an age when smartphones and mobile technology are used for just about everything, many health systems rely on fax machines, pagers, two-way radios, landline phone calls, and even sticky notes to coordinate patient care. Vital information often falls through the cracks, leading to wasted resources, delayed treatments, decreased quality of care, and billions of dollars lost annually due to medical errors.

Unlike other solutions that only connect people within the four walls of their own facility or organization, Pulsara can connect ANYONE from ANYWHERE for ANY condition or event, enabling true systems of care that scale. Purpose-built to improve the lives of people in need and those who serve them, Pulsara streamlines all logistics and communication around patient events.

Simply CREATE a dedicated patient channel. BUILD the team. And COMMUNICATE & TRACK using audio, live video, instant messaging, data, images, and key benchmarks, all using the devices you and your teams know and love. You can add a new organization, team, or individual to any encounter, dynamically building a care team as the patient condition and location evolve. And when disaster strikes, Pulsara scales to manage incidents and events, allowing your teams to use the same familiar platform to respond to major incidents the same way they would a routine call. No matter what the situation is, Pulsara connects the right people at the right time, around every patient.

At Pulsara, we live by the phrase “It’s About People.” We see our customers as partners in a journey committed to improving the lives of every person they serve. By leveraging innovative communication features through the Pulsara platform, customers across the globe have improved patient outcomes, including:

* In Texas, a hospital decreased the time it takes for stroke patients to receive tPA by 59%, dropping from an average of 110 minutes to 46 minutes

* In an Australian health system, the ambulance routinely bypasses the emergency department to take patients directly to CT in 7 minutes on average, down 68% from a 22-minute average

* A health system in Arkansas treated STEMI patients in an average of 63 minutes, a 19% decrease in just 4 months

* An EMS agency in Texas used Pulsara to power their ET3 program and in just 3 weeks, prevented 434 low-acuity patients from needing to go to the hospital

* An EMS agency in Texas reported that when using Pulsara for a full-scale crisis exercise, they had 100% accountability for all patients transported

Connected teams have the power to achieve incredible results by bringing the focus back to what matters most: people.

==================================

PULSARA®  is a registered trademark and service mark of CommuniCare Technology, Inc. d/b/a Pulsara in the United States, Australia, New Zealand, and the United Kingdom.

OFFICIAL FDA INTENDED USE STATEMENT
The Pulsara applications are intended to facilitate communication for and accelerate preparation of acute care coordination. The applications are not intended to be relied upon for making diagnostic or treatment decisions or used in connection with monitoring a patient.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Pulsara 63 includes
* Image, ECG, and Audio Clip improvements
* Bug fixes and other improvements

apps.title: Zenzap: Work communication app
apps.description:
Join the thousands of teams who chose Zenzap as their go-to work chat app. 
Switch to a professional team chat app and keep your team connected, professional, and productive.

Why Teams Love Zenzap:

Keep Work and Personal Life Separate
No more mixing personal messages with work chats. Zenzap keeps communication focused and professional - so you can actually unplug when the day is done.

Share Files Without Storing Them on Personal Phones
Files, photos, and documents are safely stored in the cloud, not on your team’s devices. Never lose a file - or risk one falling into the wrong hands.

Instant Off-boarding
One click removes ex-employees from all chats and blocks access to sensitive business info - no more chasing people down in random groups.

Assign Tasks Right in Chat
Turn any message into a task. Set deadlines, track progress, and get work done without switching apps.

Sync With Your Calendar
Turn important tasks into calendar events in seconds - so nothing slips through the cracks.

Organize Chats by Project, Team, or Location
Folders help you keep conversations tidy and easy to find.

Control Access, Protect Your Data
Your business communication stays secure and in your hands. With Zenzap you can revoke access instantly, keep data off personal devices, and manage permissions effortlessly - so the right people always have the right access.

Respect Work-Life Boundaries
Set working hours for your team to mute notifications outside of work time.

Keep Team Info Private
Choose whether team members can see each other’s phone numbers or emails. Protect privacy and prevent unwanted contact.

Cross-Device Sync
Start a conversation on mobile, finish it on desktop - Zenzap works wherever you do.

Import WhatsApp Groups Easily
Bring your existing WhatsApp groups into Zenzap with full history, media, and members in just 2 steps.

Trusted by Teams Around the World
From small businesses to global teams, Zenzap helps thousands of professionals communicate clearly and work smarter every day.

Start for Free
No credit card required.
No steep learning curve.
Just better communication - built for your team.

Switch to a professional team chat app and keep your team connected, professional, and productive.

Why Teams Love Zenzap:

Keep Work and Personal Life Separate
No more mixing personal messages with work chats. Zenzap keeps communication focused and professional - so you can actually unplug when the day is done.

Share Files Without Storing Them on Personal Phones
Files, photos, and documents are safely stored in the cloud, not on your team’s devices. Never lose a file - or risk one falling into the wrong hands.

Instant Off-boarding
One click removes ex-employees from all chats and blocks access to sensitive business info - no more chasing people down in random groups.

Assign Tasks Right in Chat
Turn any message into a task. Set deadlines, track progress, and get work done without switching apps.

Sync With Your Calendar
Turn important tasks into calendar events in seconds - so nothing slips through the cracks.

Organize Chats by Project, Team, or Location
Folders help you keep conversations tidy and easy to find.

Control Access, Protect Your Data
Your business communication stays secure and in your hands. With Zenzap you can revoke access instantly, keep data off personal devices, and manage permissions effortlessly - so the right people always have the right access.

Respect Work-Life Boundaries
Set working hours for your team to mute notifications outside of work time.

Keep Team Info Private
Choose whether team members can see each other’s phone numbers or emails. Protect privacy and prevent unwanted contact.

Cross-Device Sync
Start a conversation on mobile, finish it on desktop - Zenzap works wherever you do.

Import WhatsApp Groups Easily
Bring your existing WhatsApp groups into Zenzap with full history, media, and members in just 2 steps.

Trusted by Teams Around the World
From small businesses to global teams, Zenzap helps thousands of professionals communicate clearly and work smarter every day.

Start for Free
No credit card required.
No steep learning curve.
Just better communication - built for your team.

apps.title: Lochbox: Communication Privacy
apps.description:
Secure live chats, calls, and meetings in a private messenger that gives you exclusive control of your encryption. Like an adblock or antivirus for your conversations, Lochbox offers free voice and video calling, group messaging, and meetings that keeps trackers, hackers, and bad actors out. Protect your communications with friends and family, for your business or work and take comfort in knowing your personal, secret, and/or professional conversations can only be accessed by the intended parties.

User-controlled Encryption
Just because something is encrypted doesn’t mean it’s private or secure. If your service provider controls the encryption then they can access your content. When paired with our Key Manager app, Lochbox gives you exclusive custody of your encryption keys so only you can decide who has access. We couldn’t even view your content if we wanted to.

Connect Privately
Other messengers announce your registration to everyone in your contact list. We never share your account with anyone other than those you invite to connect. Lochbox even lets you keep your work and personal contacts and conversations separate so you can use the same device without exposing one to the other.

Free Chats, Calls, and Meetings
Send a message to one person or a thousand; talk using voice or video; meet or hangout with screen sharing on any supported device. Whether you don't like sharing your phone number or you don't have one we've got you covered.

apps.title: Speakap
apps.description:
Speakap - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

Speakap is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk. 

The benefits of Speakap
- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

Speakap is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should something go wrong, then there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- messages
- News
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications

raw_data.releaseNotes: We have fixed some performance issues that were impacting the loading times of our content. This updated fixes it alongside other minor bugs.

apps.title: StudentSquare App
apps.description:
StudentSquare, the student communication companion to ParentSquare, helps students stay connected and informed—all in one easy place. Whether it’s a quick message from a teacher, an important alert from your school, or a reminder about tomorrow’s event, StudentSquare makes sure you never miss a thing.

What you can do with StudentSquare for iOS:

• See school announcements, teacher posts, and photos
• Message your teachers directly in the app
• View school and classroom calendars and RSVP for events
• Sign up for activities, volunteering, and appointments
• Fill out forms online

With StudentSquare, you can stay on top of all the updates and notifications that you get from school, right from your phone.

apps.title: Vonage Business Communications
apps.description:
Use your Vonage® Business when you’re on the go!
 
• Maintain a single business identity when calling, texting or video conferencing. 
• Communicate your way with calling, texting or video conferencing anytime, anywhere. 
• Play or read voicemails and even manage settings on the go. 
• Activate Call Forwarding or “Do Not Disturb” status 
• Import, view and edit business contacts across multiple devices
 
The Vonage Business Communications mobile app is available at no additional charge. Existing VBC customers just log in with their username and password. (Data charges may apply to mobile app usage depending on the mobile plan)
 
About the service:
Vonage Business Communications (VBC) unifies calling, messaging and meetings worldwide to provide seamless communication between customers and employees using a flexible, global cloud communication platform. The VBC Mobile App enables on-the-go employees to stay connected no matter where they are in the world.  They can maintain a single number across all devices so they can be easily reached by colleagues and customers. VBC reduces monthly phone expenses, enables centralized billing and does not require annual contracts.   
To view our Terms of Service please use this link: https://www.vonage.com/business/legal-policy-center/business-cloud/tos/

raw_data.releaseNotes: We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: Slowly: Make Global Friends
apps.description:
Slowly: Build Authentic Friendships at Your Own Pace

"In a world dominated by instant messaging, meaningful connections have become a rare luxury."

Slowly reimagines the art of correspondence, offering a unique way to make friends. Connect with penpals around the world and explore the beauty of cultural and linguistic exchange through thoughtfully written letters. Rediscover the joy of anticipation and dive into heartfelt, written conversations.

Designed for those who prefer to take their time and focus on genuine connections, Slowly brings back the charm of traditional penpals. Each letter takes time to arrive—anywhere from a few hours to a few days—depending on the distance between you and your new friend. Whether you’re looking for foreign friends, a language exchange partner, or simply a quiet space to write a meaningful letter, Slowly is here for you.

Key Features:

► Distance-Based Letter Delivery
Each letter travels at a speed that reflects the physical distance between you and your friend, creating a sense of anticipation. With no pressure to respond instantly, you have time to reflect, compose your thoughts, and share your story. This slower pace nurtures deeper and more meaningful connections.

► Collect Over 2,000 Unique Stamps
Turn every letter into an adventure by collecting unique regional stamps from across the globe. These stamps add a personal and cultural touch to your correspondence, serving as reminders of the friendships you create.

► A Safe and Secure Space for Everyone
No photos, no real names—just your thoughts, shared in a secure and stress-free environment. Whether you're an introvert looking for deeper conversations or someone who values privacy, Slowly offers a safe place to express yourself and connect authentically.

► Unlimited Letters, Always Free
Enjoy the art of writing without limits—send and receive as many letters as you like, completely free. Optional premium features are available to enhance your experience and meet your unique needs.

Who Is Slowly For?

- Anyone looking to make friends at their own pace, free from the rush of instant communication.
- Language learners seeking partners for meaningful language exchange.
- People who love writing letters and want to explore different cultures.
- Introverts and thoughtful individuals who prefer calm, meaningful interactions.
- Anyone hoping to meet new friends from all over the world.

Slowly: Authentic Friendships, at Your Speed.
Whether you’re looking to reconnect with the joy of letter writing, discover new perspectives, or simply build friendships that matter, Slowly is your perfect companion for creating meaningful connections in a fast-paced world.

Terms of Service:
https://slowly.app/terms/

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Ringotel
apps.description:
With Ringotel mobile apps you and your team members can stay connected and more productive on the go while keeping your extension with you, wherever you are.

What Ringotel brings to your team:

**Complete UC solution that works with your cloud or on-premise IP PBX installation**
• Collaborate with your team wherever you are.
• Make video calls, organise audio conferences and group chats, create public channels, share files, and much more.

**Easily and securely organise remote work for your employees**
• Dial external numbers using corporate identity/phone numbers. Receive calls through your IP PBX extension.
• Keep track of your business communications with the detailed client profiles and history of communications organised by each contact.

**Enhance connectivity and call quality event with an unstable internet connection**
• With push notifications you can stay connected anywhere you are, so that your clients stay happy with your service.
• Ringotel Shell enhances the connectivity for your employees and the quality of voice implementing the best in class audio codec Opus.

**Our top priority is the privacy of your conversations and data.**
• Ringotel apps provide encryption for calls, messages, and data by default using the strongest block ciphers available.

To use this app a subscription to Ringotel service is required.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this update, we introduce call transcriptions:
This feature allows you to read the conversation and search for specific keywords to find discussed information. 
You can also share transcriptions as a TXT file for auditing or post-processing.

apps.title: Flock: Team Communication App
apps.description:
Flock is a powerful business messaging and team collaboration app that brings all your work into one place. 

Today, your team’s communication is scattered across emails, ad hoc messages, and multiple tools. With Flock you can quickly bring people together, discuss ideas, share information, assign tasks, and track team progress, so your team can focus on what they do best. Flock effortlessly adapts to your unique needs whether you are a large enterprise, a small business, or a high-growth startup. 

With Flock you can:
• Communicate with colleagues and entire teams through 1-on-1 chats and group messaging
• Create different channels for projects, departments, or topics for focused communications
• Effortlessly search previous conversations and channels
• Send and share files on-the-go
• Hold video and audio calls with screen sharing capabilities
• Use built-in productivity tools such as to-do’s, reminders, and polls
• Integrate with all your favorite tools and services, including Google 
Drive, Trello, Jira, GitHub, Hubspot, etc.
• Rest easy because your conversations are private, safe and secure (We are SOC2 and GDPR compliant)

Flock is free to use for as long as you want. You can upgrade to our paid plans for enhanced features and increased user control.

apps.title: Securus Mobile
apps.description:
The Securus Mobile app now requires iOS 15 or higher. Please update to the latest version.

The app provides the following features to easily setup and manage our incarcerated connection services:
• Create a Securus Online account (required for app and website access)
• Change password and 4 digit PIN
• Setup security questions for easy password reset

Video Connect®
• Enroll in Video Connect, schedule a video session with an incarcerated individual remotely from anywhere in the world where you have Wi-Fi or cellular data service at all Securus sites that offer Video Connect.
• Access and view your upcoming scheduled video sessions
• Sync details of upcoming video sessions with your calendar
• Receive notifications for upcoming video sessions
• Manage photos for identification, view transaction history and manage credit/debit cards
• Test Wi-Fi/cellular connection to determine quality of Video Connect
*For best results and to reduce echo, use a headset or ear buds with microphone for Video Connect

Prepaid Calling Account Management for You
AdvanceConnect – fund this account to receive calls to the phone numbers you choose from your contact. You can:
• Enroll and add funds to AdvanceConnect account to always be ready for a call
• See available funds
• Add or change phone numbers that can receive calls
• View call details and transaction summary
• View the last call attempt to a number
• Block or unblock calls
• Enroll in AutoPay or TextPay
• Update or change credit/debit card information

Securus Debit – deposit funds to this account for your contact to use for:
• Purchase music, games and movies for their tablet
• Purchase stamps to send eMessages and eCards
Feature availability varies by facility

Messaging Services
eMessaging™
• Sign up, purchase ‘stamps’
• Send and receive messages
• Send and receive eCards - digital greeting cards to encourage and uplift
• Attach photos to messages
• Snap n’ Send™ - Snap a selfie or choose from your gallery to send a photo to your contact
• Multiple attachments – attach up to 5 eCards and photos to your message
• Transfer stamps to your contact or prepay for them to reply
• Send a 30 second VideoGram
Feature availability varies by facility

Securus Text Connect - allows real-time two-way short message communication between you and an incarcerated individual using the Securus app.
• You purchase a package of ‘Connects’ at an incarcerated’s facility and begin sending text messages through the Securus app
• The incarcerated can reply using your Connects and you will receive an app notification of incoming texts
• You can setup an automatic re-purchase of your Connects package when your balance gets low (called Recharge)
• Connects are purchased on a per-facility basis and can be used to text only incarcerated individuals located at that facility
• Digital greeting cards, called ‘eCards’, can be sent to an incarcerated individual with a text message
• Low balance alerts via email can be setup by you to always have funds to continue text messaging

apps.title: Proloquo
apps.description:
AssistiveWare Proloquo is an intuitive, easy-to-use Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) app. Based on years of research, it is the only AAC app designed to meet the needs of all ages without sacrificing ease of use or efficiency. Proloquo is more than just a communication tool; it’s a gateway to language development and effective communication.

AN EASY START
With a unique design and quick one-tap access to the most used words, you can start using AAC right away. Finding any word is effortless, with an easily accessible Search function. Need to focus on or teach specific words? Use Focus Mode™ and draw attention without restricting or deleting words.

THINKING SPACE (only available on iPad)
Understanding a beginning communicator can feel like an endless guessing game, leading to frustration on both sides. Proloquo’s unique Thinking Space™ feature allows you to visualize and explore thoughts and meaning even with the earliest communicators. Arrange Proloquo’s visuals in any order for more intuitive communication. Understand each other faster and easier with Proloquo’s Thinking Space.

GROWS WITH YOU
Proloquo offers an extensive vocabulary unmatched in size and efficiency. With a user-friendly interface and innovative features such as Related Words™, Proloquo ensures everyone, from toddlers to adults, can discover, learn, and love language. Proloquo also offers a full keyboard with word prediction to support literacy.

GET EXPERT AAC GUIDANCE WITH PROLOQUO COACH
We know learning AAC can be challenging - that’s why we paired Proloquo with Proloquo Coach. Free with a Proloquo subscription, it equips families and educators with the tools and knowledge needed to support children and students in learning to communicate using AAC. With fast in-app support and guided practice, you will always know what to do next.

SHARE PROLOQUO WITH YOUR TEAM FOR FREE
Share Proloquo at no additional cost. Involve teachers, Speech Pathologists, and grandparents - download the Proloquo app and sync across multiple devices for free.

Try Proloquo free for one month!

How payment works
• After your trial ends, payment will be charged to your Apple ID.
• Subscriptions renew automatically. Payment is charged 24 hours before the current subscription period ends.
• Don’t want to renew? Cancel more than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
• Want to cancel or change your subscription? Manage it in your account settings on the App Store.

The standard Apple Terms of Use apply to this app:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes: This version includes bug fixes and some performance improvements. Thank you for updating and using Proloquo.

apps.title: Rocket.Chat
apps.description:
Rocket.Chat is a customizable open source communications platform for organizations with high standards of data protection. It enables real-time conversations between colleagues, with other companies or with your customers, across devices on web, desktop or mobile.

The result is an increase in productivity and customer satisfaction rates. Everyday, tens of millions of users in over 150 countries and in organizations such as Deutsche Bahn, The US Navy and Credit Suisse trust Rocket.Chat to keep their communications completely private and secure.

By opting for Rocket.Chat, users also benefit from free audio and video conferencing, guest access, screen and file sharing, LiveChat, LDAP Group Sync, two-factor authentication (2FA), E2E encryption, SSO, dozens of OAuth providers and unlimited users, guests, channels, messages, searches and files. Users can set up Rocket.Chat on cloud or by hosting their own servers on-premises.

With thousands of contributors and stars on Github, Rocket.Chat has the world’s largest community of chat developers in the open source communication sector.

When you choose Rocket.Chat, you join an ever-growing passionate community that constantly improves our platform with us :)

KEY FEATURES:

* Open Source Software
* Hassle-free MIT license
* BYOS (bring your own server)
* Multiple Rooms
* Direct Messages
* Private & Public Channels/Groups
* Desktop and Mobile Notifications
* 100+ available integrations
* Edit and Delete Sent Messages
* Mentions
* Avatars
* Markdown
* Emojis
* Choose between 3 themes: Light, Dark, Black 
* Sort conversations alphabetically or group by activity, unread or favourites
* Transcripts / History
* File Upload / Sharing
* I18n - [Internationalization with Lingohub]
* Hubot Friendly - [Hubot Integration Project]
* Media Embeds
* Link Previews
* LDAP Authentication
* REST-full APIs
* Remote Locations Video Monitoring
* Native Cross-Platform Desktop Application

apps.title: Vocera Vina
apps.description:
Vocera Vina is a secure healthcare smartphone application that operates on the Vocera Platform to simplify and expedite clinical communication.

Unify calls, messages, alerts, alarms, and care teams around the patient in a single app customizable to all hospital roles. The app allows you to call by name, group, or broadcast, and integrates with more than 140 clinical and operational systems. Return calls with one touch and use a single login to call and securely text. Take real-time situational awareness to the next level – secure texts include patient, event, and care team context. Keep your most important information front and center with a prioritized home screen where messages manage themselves based on intelligent rules you set.

Vocera System Requirements: 
    Vocera Platform 6.4

apps.title: Zoom Workplace for Intune
apps.description:
Zoom Workplace for Intune is for admins to organize and help protect BYOD environments with mobile application management (MAM). This app helps admins to protect corporate data while keeping employees connected.

Reimagine how you work with Zoom Workplace, an all-in-one, AI-powered collaboration platform that combines team chat, meetings, phone, whiteboard, calendar, mail, notes, and more.

If you are looking for the end-user version of Zoom Workplace, download it here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zoom-cloud-meetings/id546505307?mt=8

Zoom Workplace for Intune gives enterprise users all the features they expect from Zoom, while providing IT administrators expanded mobile app management capabilities to help prevent leakage of company information. And in the event of a lost or stolen device, IT can remove Zoom Workplace from the iPhone or iPad, along with any sensitive data associated with it.

IMPORTANT: This software requires your company’s work account and a Microsoft managed environment. Some functionality may not be available in all countries. If you have issues with this software or have questions about the use of it (including questions about your company’s privacy policy), please contact your company’s IT Administrator.

Follow us on social media @zoom

Have a question? Contact us at http://support.zoom.us.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
General features:
-Call a Room feature relocated to overflow menu on mobile

Team Chat features:
-Usability enhancement for editing messages with images and files on mobile app
-Automatic message resending

Clips features:
-Clips avatars support for mobile devices

Phone features:
-Support for Zoom Phone AI and transcription language expansion

Resolved issues:
-Minor bug fixes

apps.title: HeyPal - Walkie Talkie Pro
apps.description:
HeyPal is a groundbreaking social app designed for instant and urgent communication, making it effortless to stay connected with family, friends, and colleagues. It transforms your phone into a quick connect tool, allowing you to receive voice messages without unlocking your device, even in silent mode, ensuring efficient and immediate communication in any situation.

Have you ever faced situations where your messages vanish or your calls go unnoticed in your everyday life? Perhaps the other person is busy with other matters, or maybe their phone is simply on silent mode. When you urgently need to communicate, simply hold down HeyPal's talk button to send a voice message, which will be played at a sufficient volume. Even if the call is rejected, your voice message will be delivered instantly.

[Walkie-Talkie on Your Phone]
- Provides high-quality voice communication without distance limits.

[Emergency Calls]
- Voice messages can be heard even when the phone is on silent mode.


[Simple and Efficient]
- Easy to use without complicated operations!

[Group Chat]
- Using HeyPal's group feature makes business operations, family communications, and interactions with friends more efficient.

HeyPal - the solution to unreturned messages, enabling limitless communication and ensuring instant connections! Whether it's outdoor adventures or everyday communication, HeyPal meets your communication needs in various scenarios, ensuring that each message is effectively delivered.

Terms of Service: https://uu2.me/about/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://uu2.me/about/privacy.html

apps.title: TeamLive
apps.description:
TeamLive is a highly intuitive and useful team scheduling and communication platform, built specifically for the hospitality industry by seasoned hospitality professionals.. Featuring a simple design and real-time collaboration features, the app allows you to easily view your work schedule and seamlessly communicate with your co-workers, all from your mobile device. 

The app gives you more freedom to plan your personal life. With Team Scheduling, you can dynamically view your work schedule across devices by day, week, or month; be alerted to new or updated work schedules; and take comfort in the built-in functionality to prevent scheduling conflicts (because there’s nothing worse than being understaffed for dinner rush). 

The TeamLive app is modeled after the social media you use every day, so communication has never been easier. With Team Communication, you and your team can stay in sync with company goals, status updates, and more—all from one dashboard. Easily submit time-off requests, update your availability for upcoming schedules, and trade shifts with other employees—all from the app (so you can say goodbye to those group chats forever.) 

The TeamLive app has all of the scheduling & communication tools you need, in one place!

- General performance improvement and bug fixes.

Keep your updates turned on!

apps.title: DialMyCalls: Mass Text & Voice
apps.description:
DialMyCalls is your go-to solution for mass communication. Send mass text messages, voice broadcasts, and emergency alerts in seconds. Whether you're a business, school, church, or community leader, you have the tools to communicate quickly, clearly, and affordably.

What You Can Do

Send high-volume text messages using our intuitive mass texting platform.

Broadcast voice messages to thousands with our voice broadcast app

Use the free version to message up to 25 contacts weekly — perfect for small groups

Schedule automated text messages and voice calls for future delivery

Set up auto-reply texts and SMS auto-response messages

Group your contacts to send targeted SMS and voice messages

Access mass calling features with voicemail drop if calls go unanswered

Use Cases
Schools and Educators - Share emergency notifications, closure alerts, and event reminders with parents, staff, and students using our school text messaging tools
Businesses and Enterprises - Send time-sensitive SMS alerts for internal updates, shift changes, and operations
Churches and Faith Groups - Notify members of service times, fundraisers, or prayer meetings with group texts and automated voice calls
HOAs and Residential Communities - Share maintenance notices, event updates, or urgent alerts with mass SMS and voice messages
Events and Conferences - Manage guest lists and send reminders or updates for weddings, conferences, and local gatherings
Emergency Services - Distribute emergency notifications instantly with our mass call and text broadcast features
Healthcare Providers - Send appointment reminders, health updates, and vaccination alerts using SMS and auto-reply messaging
Marketing and Promotions - Promote flash sales, special offers, and new products with mass text campaigns
Contractors and Service Providers - Keep customers informed with text alerts for appointments, updates, and service delays
Training and Workshops - Notify attendees of schedule changes, materials, and logistics with group texting and auto-response features

How It Works
Type or record a message. Select your contacts. Send or schedule instantly. Unanswered voice calls go directly to voicemail.

Flexible Access
Everything syncs in real time across mobile and desktop.

Secure and Private
DialMyCalls keeps your data safe. We never sell your contact information. All communications are encrypted and compliant with leading data standards.

Why We’re Different

Free to get started — message up to 25 contacts weekly

Pay-as-you-go pricing with no subscriptions or contracts

Works as a business texting platform or emergency notification system

Includes voicemail drop, push-to-talk, and press-1 calling options

Supports message scheduling, auto-replies, and two-way texting

Works with landline texting and web-to-phone broadcasting

Offers real-time delivery reports, opt-out management, and voice logs

Trusted by over 40,000 organizations nationwide

US-based support available 7 days a week

Need help? Call 1-800-928-2086 or visit DialMyCalls.com to learn more.

Terms of Service: https://www.dialmycalls.com/termsofservice
Privacy Policy: https://www.dialmycalls.com/privacypolicy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Free Trial Enhancements
A new persistent banner shows how many days are left in your free trial and makes upgrading easier than ever.

- Improved Onboarding Experience
Onboarding has been completely redesigned with instant phone number setup and clearer, guided steps.

- Text-to-Speech Upgrades
New “Preview” button lets you listen before sending.
Expanded support for 10 new languages: French, Chinese, German, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Danish.
Customize speech speed and use up to 2000 characters.

- Smarter App Behavior
The app now unregisters old push tokens when you log out to prevent receiving messages from another account.

- Better Recording & Contact Management
Contact imports now show a progress bar for better visibility.
You can now search through your past recordings.
Recording list has been improved for clarity and consistency.

- Fixes & Performance
Fixed layout issues with the recording modal and phone links.
Character count for messages now matches the website exactly.
Background upgrades to core libraries for speed and stability.

apps.title: ParentSquare
apps.description:
What is ParentSquare?

ParentSquare helps schools and families stay connected and informed—all in one easy place. Whether it’s a quick message from a teacher, an important alert from the district, or a reminder about tomorrow’s field trip, ParentSquare makes sure families never miss a thing.

Why families and teachers love ParentSquare:

• Simple, easy-to-use app and website
• Messages are automatically translated into 190+ languages
• Best-in-class safety and security practices
• One place for all school updates, alerts, and messages

With ParentSquare, families and staff save time and stay connected—so everyone can focus on helping students succeed.

ParentSquare for iOS

The ParentSquare app makes it easy for families to stay in the loop and engage with their child’s school community. With the app, parents and guardians can:

• See school news, classroom updates, and photos
• Receive important notices like attendance alerts and cafeteria balances
• Message teachers and staff directly
• Join group conversations
• Sign up for wishlist items, volunteering, and conferences
• Respond to absences or tardies*
• Pay school-related fees and invoices*


* If included with your school's implementation

apps.title: Cisco Jabber
apps.description:
Cisco Jabber™ for iPhone and iPad is a collaboration application that provides presence, instant messaging (IM), voice, voice messaging, and video calling capabilities on Apple iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.  Escalate your Jabber calls into multi-party conferencing with Cisco WebEx® Meetings.

This application supports the following capabilities: 

•	Integrated voice
•	High-quality video with interoperability to Cisco video endpoints
•	IM, presence
•	Visual voicemail 
•	One-tap escalation to WebEx meetings (cross-launches the Cisco WebEx® Meetings application) 

Device and Operating System Requirements:

The latest Cisco Jabber for iPhone and iPad Release is supported on iOS 18 and iPadOS 18.
iPhone models compatible with iOS18: https://support.apple.com/guide/iphone/iphone-models-compatible-with-ios-18-iphe3fa5df43/18.0/ios/18.0
iPad models compatible with iPadOS 18: https://support.apple.com/guide/ipad/ipad-models-compatible-with-ipados-18-ipad213a25b2/ipados

For more information about Cisco Jabber, visit: http://www.cisco.com/go/jabber

IMPORTANT: If connecting to Cisco Unified Communications Manager, administrators must enable the correct Cisco Jabber for iPhone and iPad configurations, or proper connectivity will not be established. For details, review the latest Cisco Jabber Installation and Configuration Guide, and Server Setup Guide.

IMPORTANT: Most of the features described above are specific to a particular system configuration. Please check with your IT administrator to determine the specific features that are available to you. 

Portions of Cisco Jabber are licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL), and are “Copyright © 1999 Erik Walthinsen omega@cse.ogi.edu”. You may obtain a copy of the LGPL license at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html.

Cisco, Cisco Unified Communications Manager and Cisco Jabber are trademarks of Cisco Systems, Inc. Copyright © 2013-2025 Cisco Systems, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

By tapping “Install” you agree to install Jabber and all future software updates, and you accept the terms of service and privacy statement below:
http://www.cisco.com/web/siteassets/legal/privacy.html

Email us at jabber-ios-feedback@cisco.com with any feedback.

apps.title: Communication  & Interpersonal Skills - Study Notes, Tips & Quizzes (free)
apps.description:
Communication & Interpersonal skills.

Interpersonal communication is an exchange of information between two or more people. It is also an area of study. Communication skills are developed and may be enhanced or improved with increased knowledge and practice. During interpersonal communication there is message sending and message receiving. This can be conducted using both direct and indirect methods. Successful interpersonal communication is when the message senders and the message receivers understand the message.

With this app you can learn on the Go & everywhere. Our Learners Don't just meet standards, They exceed them.


This is a Combination of sets, containing concepts, practice questions and study cards for practical exam preparation on the topic of Interpersonal Communication.

Get +1560  Terms, Concepts,  Quizzes , Study notes  & practice cases.

This application allows you to expand your communication knowledge, widen your Interpersonal Communication expertise, improve your practice skills, Broaden your career & academic horizons.
 
Invest in your Success Now.
Your investment in knowledge, professionalism & expertise is durable with a High added value,  it's a High return investment.

This app is suitable not only for Interpersonal Communication practitioners but also for public relation practitioners, politician,  marketing & advertisement  professionals, social researchers & CPA, CMA, CIA, ACCA, CA, ACA, CFA, CFE, CISA, PMP, AP, CGAP, CRMA, CTP, CPP, CFP candidates.


-The Content & design of this application is developed  to satisfy the exact exam candidates  needs
-We keep the application as simple as possible to let the learner focus only on the content
-The Flashcards are exam oriented and designed to enhance quick memorization
-The application is designed to let you gain time and efficiency
-The Flashcards wording enhances easy understanding to ensure higher exam score. 

This App  energized your creativity, showcases your talents and strength your self-confidence during the exam & daily work.

You will get better understanding, less preparation time & a better score in the exam.

-This application is downloaded and used by graduate & undergraduate students, teachers, lecturers, professionals, PhD, researchers, reviewers not only in the US but also in Philippines, Canada, India, Australia, Turkey, Russia, UK, GCC, India, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria, and all over the world.



Main Features:
- Exam questions and study notes
- 5 study modes
- Shareable content
- Settings: with flexibility to change font size & background control.

A large number of scholars collectively identify with and use the term interpersonal communication to describe their own work. These scholars, however, also recognize that there is a considerable variety in how they and their colleagues conceptually and operationally define this area of study. 
Culture has a strong dependence on communication because of the help it provides in the process of exchanging information in the objective to transmit ideas, feelings, and specific situations present in the person’s mind.  This means the more different an individuals cultural background is, the more different their styles of communication will be . It is stressed that there is an importance of cultural safety which is the recognition of social, economic and political positions of individuals before beginning communication. There are 5 major elements related to culture that affect the communication process:
This is a Communication Diagram showing the two different types of communication that can be done between cultures. It is then further broken down into how you appropriately communicate verbally or non verbally with individuals of different cultures.

    Cultural history
    Religion
    Value (personal and cultural)
    Social organization
    Language

apps.title: Weave Chat AAC
apps.description:
Weave Chat AAC is a free, dynamic, and completely customizable AAC app that is available to a variety of devices.

Weave Chat AAC offers a large variety of verbs (green), pronouns (yellow), questions (purple), nouns (tan/orange), adjectives (blue), and conversational words (pink). All color choices were made based on the Fitzgerald Key and new vocabulary is added weekly.

Users can add their own custom images and categories in Settings —> Manage Custom Images.

In addition, users can add their own custom phrases that can easily be accessed from their board; to add phrases, go to Settings —> Manage Phrases. 

Users can select a synthetic voice (dependent on their device settings) from Settings —> Change Voice Settings - here you can select your voice, vocal pitch, and rate of speech.

Image and text size can be personalized from Settings —> Change Image & Text Size (select from default - small, medium, and large). Settings —> Configure Image Keyboard allows the user to turn on/off features that allow for the category text to be read aloud (synthetic voice for categories), to keep the user in the category after a image has been selected (stay on category after image selection), and disable the speech output for individual words so that it only reads aloud when the white text screen is touched (synthetic voice disabled for individual words). 

The AAC board can be modified in Settings —> Manage Board Builder. Here, the user can select from the default board (you must make a copy to edit it - to do this select “Add new keyboard” and then select “Hide Images” for Type of Keyboard); grid position boards (ranging in size from 1x2 - 7x15 rows/columns); and Board Builder (gives you the option to build a board from scratch). All boards are completely editable and all custom images and categories can be used from all boards.

Lastly, Manage Pin Configuration allows the user to set a pin over all (or just some) aspects of customization to lock down features as needed.

Feature List:
- Dynamic, customizable, AAC boards
- Large variety of verbs, nouns, and adjectives with additional vocabulary added weekly
- Add custom images and custom categories
- Create and save phrases
- Select a synthetic voice (as available per your device settings)
- Copy & Paste AAC picture icon messages via “share”
- Create and/or modify AAC boards via 3 options: grid position boards (ranging from 1x2 - 7x15), hide images, and/or create a new board from scratch
- “Text” others who have the app using AAC picture icons
- Set a passcode to lock down features as needed
- Weave Chat AAC currently only has English buttons/images

apps.title: Accent Connect
apps.description:
Accent is the modern cloud communications service built for today's business, an award-winning service which keeps you connected to your business communications wherever you go. The Accent Connect app keeps you connected and collaborating with your teams from your iPhone or iPad providing mobile unified communications, team chat, collaboration, file sharing, business calling and more to businesses utilizing the Accent's cloud communication services.  

Download the Accent app today and stay connected and communicating:
•	Make and receive business calls using Wi-Fi, cellular Internet, or cellular voice 
•	Collaborate with teammates and co-workers using video, chat, and desktop sharing
•	Share files, photos, docs, links, and more from within the app
•	Listen to and manage your voicemails from anywhere
•	Integrated one-touch dialing from your company or personal directory
•	Share your presence in real-time with co-workers
•	Receive full support and technical assistance from Accent's dedicated U.S. based support team

The Accent Connect app is for use with the Accent's cloud phone system and cloud communication services. You can learn more about Accent and our cloud services at https://www.accentvoice.com.

apps.title: Pyrus · Team Communication
apps.description:
Pyrus is the team communication tool for your entire business. It incorporates real-time messaging, task delegation, and approval flows. Finally, all your tasks and conversations are in one easy-to-use interface. 

- Communicate: every task is a message thread working towards a specific goal.
- Delegate: every task has a single person responsible for it at any given moment.
- Organize: hide a task from your inbox when you don’t need to act, or snooze it when you want a friendly reminder later. 
- Track: a powerful search capability makes it easy to find the details you need.
- Anywhere: Pyrus syncs seamlessly across all your devices and even works offline.

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS
- Swipe right to hide a task from your inbox and stand by, swipe left to archive it and mark it as complete.
- Forward any email to x@pyrus.com to turn it into a task.
- Attach documents, photos, or files from cloud storage like Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive.
- Use subtasks to split a large task into a list of action items.
- Get a notification whenever your action or input is requested.
- Share images and documents from other apps.

Pyrus is free to use for an unlimited number of people, offering upgradeable plans for extended usage, increased storage, unlimited API calls, and custom data access policies.
 - Login with your G+ account 
- Invite colleagues from Address Book 
- Work with outsourcers and subcontractors. 

*** Notifications 

- Badge on app icon shows the number of unread tasks in your Inbox 
- You receive push notification when something important happens with your tasks in Pyrus

Pyrus works offline and seamlessly syncs in background. No frozen UI, no duplicates.

raw_data.releaseNotes: The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: GoTools by Proximiti
apps.description:
GoTools by Proximiti is a set of information tools for on the go individuals, particularly network marketing professionals.  Tools include Shout!, a multimedia messaging system that lets individuals rapidly communicate with their hierarchy and with custom lists of individuals.  To support Shout!, it also includes automatic synchronization between the device's contacts and the Shout! Address book, and MyLibrary to store media assets obtained from the device and elsewhere.  It also contains an organization level phone book, bulletin board, calendar, push notifications, and web links.  Organization level information can only be modified by the administrator.  The application then provides convenient, read-only access to that information.  

You should only download this application if you have previously obtained credentials approved by the organization administrator.  There is no ability to obtain an account independently.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Minor bug fixes.

apps.title: Speeko: AI for Public Speaking
apps.description:
Instant feedback on your speaking style. Speak confidently everywhere. 

Transform your speaking skills with real-time feedback on your pace, tone, and fillers. Benefit from our cutting-edge technology that adapts to your specific needs and intelligently recommends tailored lessons and exercises.

Speeko is more than just a public speaking app — it's a complete communication coach. Whether you're preparing for a job interview, a virtual meeting, or a wedding toast, Speeko will give you the confidence and skills you need to speak with authority and impact.

And with the added expertise of America's top voice coach, Roger Love, our app takes your learning experience to the next level.

Join the hundreds of thousands of people who have improved their speaking skills with Speeko. Try it now for free and experience the difference for yourself.

------------------------------------------------

Subscription Pricing and Terms:

Speeko offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
Monthly: $19.99 per month
Yearly: $6.67 per month (One payment of $89.99 billed every 12 months)

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary, and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Your Speeko Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Your account will be charged for the renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. 

You can go to your iTunes Account Settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew.

If you have any comments or questions, email info@speeko.co. 

Read our terms and conditions here:
https://www.speeko.co/terms-and-conditions

Read our privacy policy here:
https://www.speeko.co/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New:
- Introducing Content Feedback! After each session, you’ll get insights on how well your words flow and capture attention. From storytelling to meetings to interviews, Speeko will help you strengthen not just your voice, but your message itself.

apps.title: DION UC
apps.description:
DION is a unified communications platform for medium and large companies that includes key tools for effective teamwork: video conferencing, broadcasts, chats, calls, video hosting, management of meeting rooms, online whiteboard.
DION ensures the highest quality of communication even at low internet connection speeds.

DION OFFERS:
●Comfortable communication and online conferences for up to 5000 attendees, broadcasts for up to 20 000 attendees.
●High sound and video quality thanks to noise reduction using neural networks, smart bitrate and data loss compensation.
●Security provided by reliable traffic encryption and enhanced data transmission protection.
●Resource savings: low traffic consumption, energy efficient applications and technical support at all stages of the platform operation.

apps.title: Communic8
apps.description:
The perfect companion app to the Communic8 enterprise platform to view your employer's communications from anywhere at anytime. Our mobile application delivers your employer's communications to your hands, allowing you to engage whether you're at the airport, sitting on a beach or on a coffee break. The employee mobile experience is managed and delivered through the Communic8 platform. To use this app, you must work for an organization that is subscribed to Communic8.

About the Communic8 platform: Communic8 is a complete engagement platform targeting enterprise communication and change management. Using Communic8, your organization can easily create audience-specific, rich, multimedia content for direct delivery to the employee device. The powerful, real-time analytics engine transparently, tracks engagement and sentiment through every stage of an employee's experience with the communication, allowing the organization to target, measure and optimize employee communication for greater impact. 

Top features or of our mobile app include:

apps.title: GroupSpot
apps.description:
Everyone knows email is messy, chat is noisy, social media is spyware, and single-purpose apps are exhausting. It doesn’t have to be this way.

At GroupSpot, we’ve built the ultimate group communications platform optimized for community, utility, and privacy. Groups have all the tools they need to succeed in a single solution, whether it’s a small circle of friends or a town sports league. When it comes to group communications, you won’t find a platform with more flexibility and efficiency than GroupSpot.

Here’s a few groups using GroupSpot today:

Families
Share meaningful moments and big wins with the wider family. You now have a home for all those moments only your cousins would care about: curtain call at the grade school play, mom crossing the finish line in the local 5k, and dad’s epic fail on the trampoline. In between, GroupSpot ensures you’re on top of Family Birthdays, Graduations, and Anniversaries.
 

Community Groups
Be a hometown hero and bring your local community into the 21st century with GroupSpot. Replace the color-coded weekly email blasts and clunky web signups with a single platform solution. Watch as engagement skyrockets simply because it’s easier to access and participate. This includes HSAs/PTAs, Newcomers, Non-Profits, Rotary Clubs, and other Community Groups.

Book Clubs
Unlike other book club apps looking to sell you books or collect your data, GroupSpot’s only interest is your Book Club. We make your monthly meetings great by sharing important details like discussion topics, RSVP, and host messages. We’ve also created a home for your past books where you can access, rate, and review any book ever read by your Book Club.

Teams
We provide all the bells and whistles you’ve come to expect with team apps like schedules, games, rosters, directions, and player availability. But GroupSpot is also great for casual groups like pickup soccer when all you care about is having enough players to field a game. Or teams that compete outside the playing field like academic teams and marching bands.

Faith Groups
Make your engagement with your House of Worship more than a once-a-week event by staying better connected through GroupSpot. Share inspirational scripture, preview the upcoming sermon, organize potluck dinners, plan the perfect retreat, support those in need, and more.

GroupSpot also has advanced features for the engineer in all of us: 

• Mass Communications: Email, Pushes, In-App Alerts
• Personal and Group Chat
• Shared Photo Albums
• Signups, Polls, Forms, RSVPs, Links, Attachments
• Games, Schedules, Rosters, and Player Availability for Teams
• Meetings, Books, Discussions Topics, Ratings, and Reviews for Book Clubs
• Advanced Member Management
• Subgroups and Sister Group Management

And much more…

About GroupSpot
GroupSpot is working hard to become a leader in the group communications space. But behind those lofty ambitions, you’ll find real purpose. At its core, GroupSpot was designed with a single, guiding principle in mind, protecting your privacy. When you have a subscription model, there’s no incentive to mine someone’s personal data or keep them glued to their screen. We will never, ever, invade your privacy.

We’ve built a privacy-first, group communications platform because we believe there is a growing number of groups who share our passion. We believe in smarter communications, ones shaped by ethical tech and social responsibility. When it comes to group communications, there are plenty of choices, but none that rival GroupSpot in purpose and design.

Please view the Terms of Service (EULA) here: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

GroupSpot

apps.title: ADMINS | TalkingPoints
apps.description:
The TalkingPoints for Admins app helps admins stay connected to their school community while on the go. Through this app, you can send messages and announcements from your school inbox or personal inbox and receive replies from families. TalkingPoints will continue adding to and improving the mobile app to maximize effective engagement for our on-the-go administrators.

With the TalkingPoints for Admins app, you can:
• communicate with families through 2-way messaging, with automatic translation in 150+ languages
• quickly send messages to one parent, a group of family contacts, a class, or the entire school
• engage with families in an equitable way by sending messages that arrive via text message or the TalkingPoints for Families app
• attach pictures, videos and files to your messages

TalkingPoints for Admins is for school administrators whose school or district partners with TalkingPoints.

apps.title: Talker PTT Walkie Talkie
apps.description:
Talker.Network is a versatile Push To Talk and Walkie Talkie App designed to cater to various industries and organization types. We've packed it with an array of powerful features, making it the go-to solution for streamlined communication.

Key Features:

- Push To Talk: Experience real-time voice communication, just like using traditional walkie-talkies.
- Text Messaging and attachments: Send text messages and attachments for more detailed discussions.
- Live Location Tracking: Know where your team members are at all times, enhancing safety and coordination.
- Clock In/Clock Out: Efficiently manage your workforce's attendance and time-tracking.

Talker uses its proprietary super-fast push-to-talk protocol and is not interoperable with Zello, Voxer, Sprint Direct Connect, AT&T Enhanced PTT, Motorola Wave PTX, Verizon Push to talk or Orion Push To Talk.


For Retail Stores: Enhance customer service and manage inventory with efficient communication.

In Manufacturing: Improve production processes and team coordination for optimal efficiency.

In Education: Connect staff to create a seamless learning experience.

For Real Estate: Coordinate property viewings and streamline property management tasks.

For Security: Ensure the safety and security of your premises with instant communication.

In Non-Profit Organizations: Facilitate collaboration among volunteers and staff, no matter where they are located.

In Healthcare: Increase the efficiency of patient care and safety with real-time updates.

For Hospitality: Elevate guest services by ensuring staff members can meet every guest's request promptly.

In Transport and Logistics: Optimize operations and reduce delays by providing your teams with instantaneous communication.

For Organizations with Remote Employees: Keep your remote teams connected and informed, no matter where they are working.


Streamline your communication, boost efficiency, and improve collaboration across various sectors. Download Talker.Network today and experience the future of real-time engagement!


Know more at [https://talker.network](https://talker.network) 

We take customer experience very seriously and please reach out to us at support@talker.network

apps.title: Vocantas Communicate Mobile
apps.description:
The Communicate Mobile app enables streamlined communications between organizations and its employees for simplified shift management and mass notification. Through the app, employees can instantly bid on open shifts posted by scheduling administrators. The notification tab allows employees to review bid statuses and company wide mass communications.  
 
KEY FEATURES 
 
Employees 
- Bid on open shifts and accept shift offers 
- View bid statuses (won/lost) 
- Stay notified with mass communications from your organization 
 
Scheduling and System Administrators 
- Send out shift offers made available on the Communicate Mobile app 
- Keep in touch with your workforce using the Communicate Mobile app as a communication channel 
 
* The Communicate Mobile app is designed for use by Vocantas clients and requires authorized Vocantas credentials. 
**Important: If you are a Vocantas client experiencing trouble logging in, contact your system administrator.

apps.title: Crait - Secure Communication
apps.description:
What is Crait?
Crait is where secure communication and collaboration happens. It is a secure messaging tool designed to make working life easier and more productive for work-groups.

Why Crait?
The simple answer is: Businesses need to protect their digital assets. Businesses are targets and will be targets of cyber hacking because they have information valuable to would-be criminals. 
No sector of corporate America is excluded from the threat of cyber hacking. This is why at Crait, we believe that business communication deserves a security upgrade.

What Crait provides
- Secure one-on-one or group calls and can support chats with up to 1000 people.
- Messages that self-destruct after the messages are read.
- End-to-end encryption between the sender’s device and the recipient such that the encryption key never leaves the device; no party in the middle.
- Secure chat, voice, as well as file-sharing capabilities to work-groups.
- Secure email for Crait-to-Crait users.


Pro edition service

-    Length of subscription: one month

-    Price: $2.99 per month

-    Payment: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

-    Turned off: Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

-    Auto-renewal: Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

-    Account management: Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

-    Privacy policy: https://www.craitapp.com/useragreement.php

-    Payment terms of use: https://www.craitapp.com/permission/index.html#/agreement

-    Auto-renewal terms of use: https://www.craitapp.com/permission/index.html#/renewagreement

apps.title: Join - Medical Communication
apps.description:
Join is the hub for healthcare professionals and providers.
It simplifies communication and collaboration between clinicians and healthcare providers through its secure and compliant patient information sharing technology.
Join also enables clinicians to view high-resolution CT/MRI images via a DICOM viewer anywhere, reducing the need for them to switch between sites and helping speed up care delivery without sacrificing quality.
Join easily integrates into internal IT systems such as PACS and EMR*, enabling users to view and share EHR information*, various diagnostic images, laboratory data*, and prescriptions*.
* This feature is optional and currently limited to a few specific EMRs

Join is also certified as a software medical device by PMDA (Japan), FDA (United States), CE (European Economic Area), and ANVISA (Brazil).

Functions:
- Connect to internal systems in hospitals such as PACS
- Support private 1 on 1 chatting and group chatting
- Use as medical cooperation tool between hospitals
- Send and receive DICOM images in a chat, within a hospital, and between hospitals
- Watch live streaming video from ICU, operation rooms, and patients’ room

Security:
- Anonymity processing for patients' personal information by gateway server
- Encrypting chat data which was saved on device
- Encrypting by using VPN connection between Inner-hospital system and Cloud
- TLS/SSL encryption between devices and Cloud
- Preventing unauthorized access by requiring passcode at application startup
- Non-downloadable medical images (clearing cache each time)
- ISMS (ISO27001) certified

Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

apps.title: Learn Communication Skills
apps.description:
Learn Communication Skills
A decade-and-a-half later, with the rise of social media networking and texting, communication is becoming more casual, even in situations where more formal ways of communicating are required. What this means is that people from the younger generation, may not know or even understand the importance of effective communication skills in the workplace. When you take a look at the greatest leaders, one of the traits they possess, is the ability to communicate effectively, which underscores the importance of communication skills.
Alpha Z Studio provides you communication skills app in which you will learn how to communicate with people in a good way. More details are given below.

types of communication
Your communication skills will fall under four categories of communication. Let's take a closer look at each area.

1. Written communication
Writing is one of the more traditional aspects of communication. We often write as part of our job, communicating via email and messenger apps like Slack, as well as in more formal documents, like project reports and white papers.

Conveying information clearly, concisely, and with an accurate tone of voice are all important parts of written communication.

2. Verbal communication
Communicating verbally is how many of us share information in the workplace. This can be informal, such as chatting with coworkers about an upcoming deliverable, or more formal, such as meeting with your manager to discuss your performance.

3. Non-verbal communication
The messages you communicate to others can also take place non-verbally—through your body language, eye contact, and overall demeanor. You can cultivate strong non-verbal communication by using appropriate facial expressions, nodding, and making good eye contact. Really, verbal communication and body language must be in sync to convey a message clearly.

4. Visual communication
Lastly, visual communication means using images, graphs, charts, and other non-written means to share information. Often, visuals may accompany a piece of writing or stand alone. In either case, it's a good idea to make sure your visuals are clear and strengthen what you're sharing.

Why Is Effective Communication Important?
Effective communication is vital both in and out of the workplace because it allows you to clearly translate your intentions and feelings into easily understandable messages. Effective communication makes you a more productive worker and cuts down on unintended consequences that arise as a result of miscommunication. Developing an effective communication process helps you understand what others are saying and makes you a better collaborator and team member.

Developing advanced communication skills begins with simple interactions. Communication skills can be practiced every day in settings that range from the social to the professional. New skills take time to refine, but each time you use your communication skills, you open yourself to opportunities and future partnerships.

If you like our app then please give us 5 star ratings. we are trying our best to make the learning process more easy and simple for you.

apps.title: Patient Communicator
apps.description:
The Patient Communicator by the Society of Critical Care Medicine is designed to improve communication among patients, families, and caregivers. With translations in 18 languages; a diary feature; options to easily communicate about pain, moods, and needs; a glossary of terms and other education materials for patients and families; the Patient Communicator app can help ease the stress of a hospital stay.

Features include:
- A diary function that allows patients to track their daily progress during and after a hospital stay
- Translation capabilities that allow for two-way communication in 18 languages on a variety of topics, such as pain, basic needs, feelings, and moods
- A scale that allows patients to identify where on the body they feel sensations of pain, itching, and nausea and express the intensity of these sensations
- More than 30 translatable phrases that allow patients to express various needs related to their care and well-being
- A glossary of terms to help educate patients and families about the intensive care unit
- A free download of the booklet Understanding Your ICU Stay: Information for Patients and Families

Available translation languages:
- English
- Español (Spanish)
- Mandarin (普通话 )
- Dutch (Nederlands)
- Hindi
- French (Français)
- Italiano
- Portuguese (Portuges)

raw_data.description:
The Patient Communicator by the Society of Critical Care Medicine is designed to improve communication among patients, families, and caregivers. With translations in 18 languages; a diary feature; options to easily communicate about pain, moods, and needs; a glossary of terms and other education materials for patients and families; the Patient Communicator app can help ease the stress of a hospital stay.

Features include:
- A diary function that allows patients to track their daily progress during and after a hospital stay
- Translation capabilities that allow for two-way communication in 18 languages on a variety of topics, such as pain, basic needs, feelings, and moods
- A scale that allows patients to identify where on the body they feel sensations of pain, itching, and nausea and express the intensity of these sensations
- More than 30 translatable phrases that allow patients to express various needs related to their care and well-being
- A glossary of terms to help educate patients and families about the intensive care unit
- A free download of the booklet Understanding Your ICU Stay: Information for Patients and Families

apps.title: NMCPHC Risk Communication APPs
apps.description:
The purpose of these APPs is to reinforce key aspects of risk communication.  The APPs include brief discussions and role play, and provide a refresher for those who have attended the Risk Communication training sponsored by the Navy and Marine Corps Public Health Center.

These workshops provide risk communication strategies and hands-on practical skills for those communications that impact your mission.  These have become critical in the age of social media and the 24 hour news cycle.

More and more information is being disseminated to a wider audience, at a quicker pace.  Some of this information is accurate, some is not, so knowing how to respond is critical to accomplishing your organization’s mission.  This includes knowing how to respond when communicating with the media, the public, the entire military community and military family members.

What we say and how we say it can have a profound impact on people's perceptions and opinions, and can result in negative impacts if we don't choose our words carefully.

apps.title: BAND for Kids
apps.description:
BAND for Kids is a group communication app designed for youth (ages 12 and under) to stay connected with their families, sports teams, scout troops, and more.  BAND for Kids is a safe space for adolescents to interact within a private social platform, while allowing parents and guardians to moderate activity.

◆ Easy to get started:
- Kids can get started by following these three steps:
1) Download BAND for Kids app to a mobile phone or tablet.
2) Use an email address to sign up (parent consent is required).
3) Join a private Band by parents or guardian invitation.

◆ How parents and kids communicate together safely:
- Kids cannot join groups they were NOT invited to.
- Parents can monitor which group their kids have joined.
- Parents can follow their children’s BAND activity by also joining their groups. 

◆ Safer environment for kids to communicate:
- No harassment from strangers.
- No advertisements and in-app purchases.
- Kids cannot create or invite themselves to Bands/Pages.
- Kids cannot search or join public Bands.

◆ Available features for kids:
- Admin of the Band can determine which features are available to the Kids users.
- With BAND for Kids, adolescent users can publish posts on the Community Board and attach files, images, or videos to the posts.  They can also chat with other members of their Bands.

◆ Accessibility:
- BAND for Kids is available on any device including smart phones, tablets, and PC.

◆ Private and Secure
- BAND has acquired the SOC 2 and 3 certificates for its privacy protection and ISO/IEC27001 Certification for outstanding information security management systems.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Easily Identify AI-Generated Photos and Videos
When uploading, you can label content as AI-generated. Even after posting, you can check with the "View AI Info" feature.

apps.title: PENN Connect
apps.description:
Penn Connect - The social platform for our organization: for employees and external partners

Penn Connect is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. Consisting of timelines, news feeds and chat features, similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal successes quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Convenient, especially if you do not work behind a desk. 

The benefits of Penn Connect
- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share successes
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time by reducing e-mail and find what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Feature list:
- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- messages
- News
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications

raw_data.releaseNotes: We did some small bug fixes and improved the general performance and stability of the app.
