apps.title: Elevate UC
apps.description:
Elevate UC 4+
Elevate Cloud Communications On-the-Go
Download the Elevate Mobile App for use with Elevate UC so you can call, chat, meet, and more, anywhere work takes you.

The Elevate Mobile App transforms your mobile phone into an essential collaboration tool, making teamwork on the go easier than ever. Place and receive calls, see who is available, chat with colleagues, host or join meetings, and manage voicemails all from one application – anytime, anywhere.

Never Miss Important Calls
Extend your business phone number and extension to your mobile phone, so you can place and receive calls on the go or even transfer calls from your desktop phone to your mobile device – seamlessly, without interruption.

Easily Collaborate From Anywhere
Your desktop chat is synchronized in real-time with your mobile device so you can stay connected and continue conversations no matter where you are. Now, with Elevate AI Assistant, you can effortlessly access information and simplify your daily tasks using the power of generative AI technology.

All Your Important Collaboration Tools Right on Your Mobile Device, Including:
• An integrated, searchable corporate contact list
• One-tap calling of your contacts
• One-tap calling into conference bridges
• The ability to manage multiple calls at once
• Voicemail transcription
• Advanced calling features:
      •	Call transfers – blind and warm
      •	Call Flip – quickly flip between mobile and desk phone during active calls
      •	Call Forwarding – allows greater flexibility to customize call flows based on specific, predetermined schedules, number of rings, and routing instructions to other users or phone numbers
• Team chat and messaging
• Elevate AI Assistant – an integrated generative AI tool, that provides quick, helpful responses to a variety of tasks via Elevate chat
• The ability to host and attend meetings 
• The ability to securely access and share files (requires ShareSync Mobile App)

IMPORTANT: The Elevate Mobile App requires an Elevate UC account.

* LEGAL DISCLAIMERS
1. It is important that you understand the 911 policies before using this product. For more information on these policies, please see https://www.serverdata.net/legal/911Notifications-VTS.pdf 
2. Call quality may be affected when using Wi-Fi or Cellular Data.
3. International and roaming data charges from your mobile carrier may apply.
4. You are responsible for ensuring that all call recordings comply with any applicable federal or state law (including consent requirements.)
5. By downloading Elevate UC, you agree to the terms of the End User License Agreement and acknowledge that you accept the Privacy Policy, and the AI Policy and Notifications within the following links (see https://serverdata.net/legal/eula.aspx, https://www.serverdata.net/legal/privacy-policy.aspx, and https://www.serverdata.net/legal/ai-policy-notifications.aspx).

apps.title: Question Roulette App
apps.description:
Do you need speech training for an interview, a sales pitch, a presentation, a party, or even a relationship talk? Question Roulette provides a concrete, effective way to work on your public speaking skills. This innovative communication skills training app helps you practice and track your improvement.

How the Question Roulette App works:
- Question Roulette lets you answer difficult questions or objections, with topics like general business, relationships, self-reflection, cocktail party banter, and many other public speaking situations. 
- Record your answer and listen to how you did. You can also read a transcript of your response, very useful for interview training.
- Get immediate, concrete feedback on: time speaking, amount and type of filler language, and pace of speech. 
- Save your best recordings, rate yourself with self-assessments, and track your improvement.
- Share your best responses and get feedback from colleagues or friends, to take your speech training to the next level.

Answering tough questions is great for overall communications training. Examples include:
• “You’re not qualified for this position.”
• “What do you want to do with your life?”
• “Where is this relationship going?”

Practicing out loud is the best way to prepare for an interview or presentation, and our interview questions training app makes it easy and fun. Improve your performance and build confidence before you ever get in the room.

You can experience this interview training app in three different modes: choose the objection yourself, get one roulette question asked randomly with time to warm up, or get one question at random and start speaking immediately.

Choose Question:
In the “Choose Category” screen, you can pick a topic area and then choose a question you want to practice answering for interview questions training. You can see default questions or ones you’ve created yourself (if you own a “Group Account”).

Roulette Mode:
This allows you to practice answering questions one after another, great for developing public speaking skills. In this mode, the app prompts you with a random question. You can think, prepare yourself, and start answering the roulette questions when you feel ready.

Rapid Fire:
The Rapid Fire mode challenges you to answer questions without having the time to prepare a response, which is excellent for interview skills training. In this mode, the app chooses a question at random for you, and you need to begin answering it when the three-second countdown ends.

Metrics for Recorded Answers:
Once you record an answer, Question Roulette creates a transcript and shows data about your response, such as time speaking, filler language used, and words per second. Our interview training app will give you concrete feedback on your answer and suggest tips and videos to help you improve your speaking skills.

Self-Assessment and Feedback:
After you review your answer and do a self-assessment, you can delete or replay your recording, as well as save it for future reference. If you want to get feedback on your answers from other users, you can share it. Both the self-assessment and feedback are rated from 1 to 5 stars.

In-App Purchases:
You can purchase the Exclusive World and unlock more questions in our roulette questions app. You’ll get exclusive access to 25+ additional questions related to job interviews, start-ups, and entrepreneurship!

Download the Question Roulette App and start speech training today to improve your communication skills!

EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

AI-generated random questions for speech practice 
Boosts confidence, fluency, and quick thinking

apps.title: ServiceMax Zinc
apps.description:
Zinc connects technicians with the people and information they need. 




Zinc Real-Time Communication connects technicians in real time with the people and information needed to confidently get the job done quickly and correctly, allowing the organization to reduce mean time to repair, boost customer satisfaction and improve employee engagement. Instead of turning to non-compliant consumer apps, service teams can now turn to a powerful, yet easy to use, team communication platform purpose-built for their needs — ServiceMax Zinc.


Hotline Communication:
• Connects technicians to the right expert instantly with Hotline bots
• Bypass long call canter queues and email exchanges to get information quickly and efficiently
• Track every request 
• Measure resolution times, quality of internal service, and adapt Hotline staffing to changing demands


Broadcast Communication:
• Broadcast information in real time to your teams’ mobile devices 
• Alerts fill the screen, requiring team members to interact with the message to continue in the app
• Target a specific group of employees based on critera such as group membership, department, location, work skills, or role


Team Communication:
• Communicate 1:1 and in groups 
• Text, voice, video, content sharing and location sharing
• Conversations linked to ServiceMax records (such as Assets, Work Orders, Cases, Returns) for easy reference and access


Security:
• Military-Grade Encryption
• Customer Data Security
• Data Center Security
• Application Security
• Business Continuity and Reliability


Privacy:
• Data Ownership
• Custom Data Storage and Deletion
• Multi-Factor Authentication
• SSO and SAML 2.0

apps.title: Leeloo AAC - Autism Speech App
apps.description:
Leeloo is an app that helps non-verbal kids to communicate with their parents, teachers and friends. Leeloo is developed with the AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication) and PECS (Picture Exchange Communication System) principles. Which is strong techniques for autism treatment and autism therapy in communication.

In this app, there is a card for every word that your kid might need to use in daily. And every card is matched with an definitive vector image about the phrase or word your kid trying to communicate.

Leeloo also has text to speech voice capability. Every card pressed will reveal options of phrases, and the chosen phrase will be read by a text-to-speech robot.

Leeloo designed for kids suffering mental, learning or behaviour disorders mostly Autism and is suitable for but not limited to;
- Aspergers syndrome
- Angelman syndrome
- Down syndrome
- Aphasia
- Speech apraxia
- ALS
- MDN
- Cerebral pally

Leeloo has pre-configured and tested cards for preschool and currently attending school kids. But can be costimazed for an adult or a later age person who is suffering similar disorders or in the spectrum mentioned.

The functionality of the Leeloo AAC is free and will stay so. Additionally we offer Premium Assistive Card packs you can add to your AAC board depending on the user's areas of interest, you can access this premium packs by unlocking "Leeloo Premium".

We offer;
1 Month from $6.99/month
1 Year from $4.99/month (Billed yearly from $59.99/year with 3-day free trial)
Lifetime from $149.99

For exact prices converted to your country of residence and currency, please see your App Settings > Subscription. Additionally we might offer discounted prices for countries with less purchasing power.

Where 1 month and 1 year plans are subscription-based and Lifetime plan is a one-time purchase.

If you upgrade to Leeloo Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

The subscription-based plan purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation for monthly and at the end of the trial for yearly plans.

Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

For more information, see our;
Terms of Use: https://dreamoriented.org/termsofuse/
Privacy Policy: https://dreamoriented.org/privacypolicy/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes on voice list.
Store listing iPad screenshot fixes.
Added ability to remove your and your child's data.

apps.title: ConnectUC
apps.description:
ConnectUC gives you full access to your business phone and unified communications with voice calling, text messaging, voicemail, co-worker presence, meetings, and more. It works across web, desktop, and mobile apps.  

Calls - Stay connected, no matter where you are! With the ability to take your extension with you, you can easily place or receive calls with features like call transfers, conference calling, call history, recordings and more. 

Visual Voicemail with Transcriptions - Never miss a voicemail with visual voicemail that includes transcriptions, allowing you to quickly and easily read your messages.

All-in-One App - Access PBX functionality seamlessly within one application, eliminating the need for multiple portals.  

Co-Worker Status - Real-time coworker phone status with integrated presence allows users at a glance to see the phone and status of users throughout the company, whether they are using their deskphone or ConnectUC. 


SMS  - Send and receive text messages using SMS with your business phone number associated with your extension, without needing to use your personal phone number. 

Messaging for Chat and Collaboration (coming soon) - Chat and collaborate with your team over messages with individual and group messaging. 

Meetings (coming soon) - Group meetings with video and screen sharing with anyone inside or outside of your company.   

Flexible Fax (coming soon) - Send and receive faxes directly from the UC Client, complete with multiple numbers and cover pages.

apps.title: Communication Skills: PatterAI
apps.description:
PatterAI is your all-in-one communication coach, helping you become more articulate, clear, and confident in how you speak.

PatterAI is more then just a public speaking app. It’s for those who want to improve their communication skills, public speaking, and voice delivery. PatterAI offers a structured, habit-forming way to sharpen how you express yourself with just a few minutes a day.

Think of PatterAI as your personal guide to better speaking. In just a few minutes each day, you can practice exercises designed to make your voice clearer and your words more impactful.

Key features:

Daily Vocal Training:
Voice is a powerful tool. We’ll give you simple, expert-designed exercises to improve how you sound. Work on speaking more clearly, strengthen your voice, and find a natural rhythm in your speech. It’s like having a voice coach in your pocket.
→ Improve your pronunciation, articulation, and vocal range
→ Build a stronger presence with your voice training routine
→ Perfect your speech with a smart AI voice coach and trainer in your pocket

Impromptu Speaking Challenges:
Think fast, speak well. Daily impromptu challenges give you fun and interesting topics to talk about. This is a great way to get comfortable with spontaneous conversations, whether you’re at a party or in a job interview.
→ Perfect for improving social skills, especially in unplanned moments
→ Strengthen your ability to speak eloquently under pressure

Real-Life Conversation Practice:

Practice realistic scenarios and develop better flow, word choice, and delivery. Whether it’s making small talk, giving feedback, or leading a team, PatterAI helps you get better with real conversation starters.
→ Learn how to start a conversation with confidence
→ Get better at icebreakers, conversation shakers, and social cues

Why Choose PatterAI?
Many apps focus on just learning new words. We believe the best way to improve is by actually speaking. Whether you want to feel more confident in social situations, prepare for a big presentation, or simply be a more effective communicator, PatterAI is here to support you.

PatterAI is for you if you want to:
- Feel more confident when you speak.
- Get your point across more clearly.
- Prepare for interviews or public speaking events.
- Improve your social skills and conversation skills.
- Speak with a stronger and calm voice.
- Cut down filler words like “ums” and “ahs.”

What You’ll Improve With PatterAI
- Communication skills for professional and personal life
- Everyday conversations and structured responses
- Public speaking with confidence and grace
- Sharpening articulation, tone, and vocal warmth
- Elevating your presence through a strong vocal image
- Reducing overused fillers and building thoughtful flow

Key Features
- Speech feedback using AI
- Filler words detection
- Vocal clarity detection
- Role play to improve small talks
- Lessons on public speaking
- Performance and streak tracking
- Accurate transcript of your session
- Access to community of public speakers
- and much more!

PatterAI includes both free and premium content. You can start practising for free and explore foundational lessons designed to build confidence in everyday interactions. A subscription unlocks access to advanced lessons, personalized feedback, and deeper conversation challenges tailored to your goals. Premium users also gain access to exclusive practice scenarios, detailed progress tracking, and adaptive learning paths that adjust based on your performance.

Download PatterAI and start your journey to becoming a more confident, articulate communicator. Our users report significant reductions in social anxiety and enhanced professional presence.

Practice. Improve. Speak Better.

Privacy Policy: https://patterai.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Support: niti@patterai.app

apps.title: Proloquo2Go AAC
apps.description:
Tap images. Type words. Speak. Proloquo2Go is an easy to use communication app for people who cannot speak or need help being understood. Featuring natural sounding voices, including real children’s voices, Proloquo2Go is a simple yet powerful AAC (augmentative and alternative communication) tool. The app is fully customizable and can be utilized to build language skills and grow with a person’s communication, supporting both beginning and advanced communicators.

Parents, therapists, teachers and users around the world recognize Proloquo2Go as the gold standard in AAC solutions. The app is used by people with autism, Down syndrome, cerebral palsy, Angelman syndrome, and others with speech difficulties. The app is available in English, Spanish, French, and Dutch and supports bilingual use, so you can switch languages on the fly.

Proloquo2Go in action:

Learn and grow

Studies show that just 200-400 words make up 80% of what we say. Known as core words, they act as the basis of Proloquo2Go’s research-based Crescendo™ vocabulary. Users can grow from single words to full sentences in the same app. Crescendo puts core words in consistent locations for easy access and motor-planning. The vocabulary works with AAC best practices like modeling (where you use an AAC system to talk with the user) to develop language skills. Crescendo offers no limit on language development with a 10,000+ fringe word vocabulary and customizable vocabulary levels. Finally, with Progressive Language, words are gradually revealed step-by-step, helping users learn words and their location as their communication expands.

Easy editing

Customizing Proloquo2Go is a breeze! Quickly and easily add new words. Use the app’s built-in library of 25,000 symbols or use your own photos by taking pictures within the app or selecting them from your photo library. For users with fine-motor challenges and vision impairments, Proloquo2Go offers options like 23 pre-programmed grid sizes and accessibility settings which support switch scanning and Apple’s VoiceOver screen reader. Everything from appearance to access is customizable so you can make it your own. 

Type and speak

Besides tapping images, Proloquo2Go also lets you type what you want to say. The app includes a Grid Keyboard arranged alphabetically for people learning to type. For more experienced typists, Proloquo2Go includes a Typing View with a QWERTY keyboard and word prediction that offers suggestions based on what you are typing. 

Hello! ¡Hola! Bonjour! Hallo!

Proloquo2Go lets you select a language and region for the Crescendo vocabulary. Two languages can be used at the same time, allowing seamless bilingual speech. Over 100 included downloadable natural-sounding adult and children’s voices rounds out your choices to use the app your way.

A helping hand

AssistiveWare is here for you every step of the way. Help articles in Proloquo2Go are there whenever you need them. New to AAC? Our website has easy to understand articles in the Learn AAC section, and the AssistiveWare Core Word Classroom includes activities for teaching communication effectively. You can also connect directly with our community of parents, professionals, and users on our Facebook groups. If you have any questions, our support team is available 7 days a week and is always happy to help. All of these online resources can be accessed by going to the AssistiveWare website. 

Note: Discounts are available through Apple’s Educational Volume Purchase Program – 50% off on 20 licenses or more. Joan Bruno’s Gateway to Language & Learning© vocabulary is available as an in-app purchase (English only).

In order to use Proloquo2Go on Apple Watch, it must be paired with an iPhone.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this latest update of Proloquo2Go, we have separated the voices upgrade from the app update. This means you can now benefit from improvements and bug fixes to your voices without needing to re-download the app. 
Additionally, we have introduced four new children's voices from Acapela for you to choose from. Thank you for updating and using Proloquo2Go!

apps.title: Olvid
apps.description:
Olvid is the first private instant messaging application for everyone.

What is a "private" messenger?

It's a messenger:

- That does not push new contacts on you. You are in control: you choose who you want to discuss with. Olvid offers several ways to invite other Olvid users, either face-to-face or remotely.

- That does not require any personal data. Olvid won't ask for your phone number, for your email. Unlike your previous messenger, Olvid will never request access to your address book.

- On which you will never receive unsolicited messages or messages from an unknown source.

- Where all exchanges benefit from the same security and privacy as a real-world discussion behind closed doors. Olvid offers end-to-end encryption and end-to-end authentication by default, always, for everything you send or receive.


Olvid guarantees you safe spaces, immune to external aggression, which isolate you from the digital noise and violence of other social networks. Create groups with your family, friends and key collaborators. No spam, no advertising. You finally regain full control over your communications.

Olvid has been designed to be the best place to exchange on subjects that matter, with those who matter to you.


Olvid - Technology
------------------

At the heart of Olvid, a 'cryptographic engine' coming from several years of research allows to mathematically prove the authenticity, the integrity, and the confidentiality of your communications.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Polls in Chats: Now create polls in any discussion and let everyone share their opinion in just a tap!
- Completely redesigned contact experience: Tap the new floating "+" button (on every tab) to add contacts instantly—via QR scan, invitation link, or from a list of suggested users (including Olvid users from shared groups).
- One-click invites: Easily connect with users from your shared groups.
- Redesigned voice message cells with interactive waveforms and playback speed controls (1x, 1.5x, 2x) for a richer audio experience.
- Improved onboarding design.
- Resolved an issue that could prevent secure calls from being properly established, improving call reliability.
- Improved the reliability of user notification delivery.
- Optimized startup operations in Olvid for faster and more efficient app launch.
- Olvid is now available in German.

apps.title: Talkbox Messenger
apps.description:
Talkbox is a chatting app made with heart <3. We started as the world’s first voice messenger, and since then we are passionate about building a fast and intuitive messenger for people to connect.

Today we have brought to you a brand-new experience of using Talkbox. Much simpler, much modern way for you to chat with your friends, acquaintances, loved ones. Simply log in, find/add your friend and start building relationships again.


What functions do Talkbox offers:

- We love voice messages. That's why we focus on building asynchronous voice chat from day one, and it is fast.
- Send direct message to your friend and family using text, voice, image, or even location messages.
- Talkbox group chat supports up to 200 people. Perfect to gather all your friends or forks from your group.
- Lena is also a friend of yours now, try to be nice to her :)

Keep happy talkbox-ing!

------------------------------

We love to hear from you.
Simply go to https://talkboxapp.com and tell us!

------------------------------

apps.title: Nextcloud Talk
apps.description:
Use Nextcloud Talk to have one-on-one or group audio or video calls, create or join web conferences and send chat messages. All communication is fully encrypted and mediated by your own server, providing the highest degree of privacy possible.

Nextcloud Talk is easy to use and will always be completely free!

Nextcloud Talk supports:
* HD (H.264) audio/video calls
* Group and one-on-one calls
* Webinars & public web meetings
* Individual and group chat
* Easy screen sharing
* Mobile call & chat push notifications
* Integration in Nextcloud Files and Nextcloud Groupware
* Fully on-premise, 100% open source
* End-to-end Encrypted calls
* Scaling to millions of users
* SIP gate: dial in by phone

The Nextcloud Talk app requires a Nextcloud Talk server to function. Nextcloud is a private, self-hosted file sync and communication platform, designed to put you back in control over your data. It runs on a server of your choice, be it at home, at a service provider or in your enterprise, and gives you access to your documents, calendars, contacts, email and other data. You can share with others even across different Nextcloud servers and work together on documents. Nextcloud is fully open source, giving you the option to extend them for your own use, participate in their development or simply verify they do what we promise.

Millions of users use Nextcloud daily at businesses and homes around the world. Business users rely on the professional support of Nextcloud GmbH, making sure they have a fully supported, enterprise-ready platform for productivity and collaboration, fully under control of their IT department.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Fixed screenshot sharing issue
• Polished sharing view for iOS 26
• Other bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: VitalTalk Tips
apps.description:
Having great communication skills makes a difference—your patients will understand their medical situation better, build trust with you faster, and you will be able to guide them to medical decisions that match their values.

This app helps improve your communication skills with patients experiencing serious illness and their family members. Each tip can be utilized for your specific discipline and subspecialty. For clinicians in hospital medicine, oncology, cardiology, social work, nephrology, hepatology, chaplains, neurology, trauma, emergency medicine, primary care, pediatrics, palliative care and more. This app is made for you!

We've complied the research and curated a special set of communication skill tips, focused on the moments where clinicians most often get stuck. Flip through the tips by topic (serious news, prognosis, family conferences, goals of care, and more), or just get a daily tip as a notification. Read the tip (it'll take less than 10 seconds), try it out, and over time, your practice will improve.

raw_data.releaseNotes: New features added: pin tips for easy access and app now supports multimedia. Improvements to home navigation screen.

apps.title: Chat by Storyboard
apps.description:
Chat by Storyboard is built from the ground up to allow companies to use audio to reach their frontline team more effectively. Through voice messages with AI-powered translation and transcription, managers can improve accountability, transparency, and engagement for their teams.

With our Hands-Free Mode, fleet managers, dispatchers, or safety directors can safely communicate with drivers on-the-road. Critical messages automatically play on driver’s devices or over Bluetooth, as they arrive, and can be targeted to particular groups of employees. Drivers behind schedule can share their new drop-off time safely using their only their voice for a truly hands-free experience. No manual or visual interaction required.

Companies across logistics, construction, home services and hospitality have turned to Chat to improve their frontline operations, share corporate communications, and create training opportunities for their teams. 

Upgrade your frontline from walkie-talkies and phone calls to a mobile-first audio communication tool today.

apps.title: Office Chat, Work Messaging
apps.description:
Office Chat is a secure mobile messaging service.  Improve your company's ability to collaborate, network, and share information.  Businesses big and small, start-ups, and non-profit organizations use Office Chat to streamline secure communication within their company.

Office Chat features include:

- Group messaging and private chat

- Rich text messaging features that allow you share pictures, video, and audio attachments

- Ability to view images inline and play videos directly from within the message

- Unlimited chat history

- Detailed info pages for colleagues & teams

- Message delivery confirmation for your sent messages

- Real time push notifications for messages received by you

- Quick access to colleague list & the teams you are in

- Email integration allows messages sent from Office Chat to be replied to from any email client

- Hyper real-time, where character-by-character message transfer option is available in private chat

Beyond chatting, with Office Chat you can also share files, pictures, audio, and videos with your coworkers instantly -- without worrying about exchanging phone numbers or information leaking.

What's New
+Bug fixes.

apps.title: TW Recruiting Communication
apps.description:
Teamworks Recruiting Communication is the battle-tested solution to collegiate recruiting, allowing you to efficiently deliver timely, visually captivating, and personalized messages that are sure to get noticed.

- Connect with recruits using SMS, iMessage, and X (f.k.a. Twitter)
- Create personalized messages in bulk
- Automatically record all activity in the recruit’s record 
- Easily insert recruit data for a more personalized experience
- Consolidate your program’s recruiting content for coaches and staff to access and distribute
- Mass upload, match, and send personalized graphics and videos
- Easily view past and upcoming schedules and game scores

apps.title: e2grow
apps.description:
e2grow mobile app is part of the e2grow platform. It requires a user account. 

Ever wish you had an assistant who would advise you on how to effectively communicate and collaborate with your colleagues, partners, bosses and customers? Have you ever wondered why some people just don’t get you and how you could become a more effective communicator and leader?

e2grow is the simplest and most effective tool to help you:
- get your message across more effectively,
- effectively delegate tasks,
- create meaningful relationships,
- avoid conflicts,
- …

It does that by giving you concrete, actionable advice for communication and self-development in relation to your and your colleagues’ unique personality profile. Just sign in and get instant access to the personality profiles of the people you work with the most.

This app is part of a wider platform, which can be integrated in the tools you use every day (Outlook, Slack, etc.).

apps.title: School communication app
apps.description:
Houd jij je bezig met de communicatie en PR voor een middelbare school of VO scholengroep? Download dan nu de Schoolcommunicatie app en stuur een mailtje naar info@infowijs.nl om toegang te krijgen.

• Bouw relaties op met vakcollega's
Heb je het gevoel dat je soms op een eiland zit en moeilijk kan sparren? Via de Schoolcommunicatie app kom je makkelijk in contact met je vakcollega's.

• Blijf gemakkelijk in contact
Stuur via de app een bericht en ga het gesprek aan met één of meerdere personen. Bijvoorbeeld vakcollega's die je hebt ontmoet bij een Infowijs Meetup, het Schoolcommunicatie Event of een Hoy Masterclass.

• Deel kennis over je vakgebied
De Schoolcommunicatie app is de plek om alles te delen over... schoolcommunicatie. Samen met jullie zorgen we ervoor dat de app aansluit op de behoefte van schoolcommunicatie-experts.

apps.title: Speech Assistant AAC
apps.description:
Speech Assistant AAC is a text-to-speech app designed for people who are speech impaired, for example due to Aphasia, MND/ALS, Autism, Stroke, Cerebral Palsy or other speech problems.

With the app you can create categories and save phrases on buttons for quick access and easy communication. You can also type messages using the iOS keyboard.

The app is affordable with a one-time payment and no subscription.

Key features
• Easy to use and fully customizable to your needs and preferences.
• Categories and subcategories to organize your phrases.
• History feature to quickly access previously entered phrases.
• Option to add symbols, emoji or photos to the buttons.
• Full screen mode to display your messages in large font.
• Autocomplete feature to display phrase suggestions in a drop-down list.
• Tabs for multiple conversations.
• Designed for iPhone and iPad, supports both portrait and landscape orientation.
• Supports Apple Watch.
• Backup to iCloud, Mail or AirDrop.

Voices
• You can choose a voice from any of the iOS system voices.
• Supports ElevenLabs voices, giving you the option to use highly realistic AI professional voice clones.
• Supports Apple's Personal Voice.
• Option to create voice recordings for the buttons and to import voice recordings.

Phone calls
• The app can also be used while making Phone and FaceTime calls.
• This works with iOS system voices and with iOS 18 also with ElevenLabs voices and regular recordings (app setting).

Categories and phrases
• Add, change or delete your own (sub)categories and phrases.
• You can create an unlimited number of categories to organize your phrases for quick access.
• Create user profiles with their own categories, phrases and settings for multi-language support or different individuals.
• Easily edit category and phrase buttons with a long press.
• With Backup to iCloud or AirDrop you can transfer your categories and phrases to another iPhone/iPad.

Fully Customizable
• The size of the buttons, the textbox and the text can be adjusted.
• The app has various color schemes and you can also create a personal color scheme.
• You can change the order of the buttons with drag and drop.

Full screen
• Show your message full screen with a very large font.
• Useful for communicating in a noisy environment.
• You can rotate the text to show your message to the person opposite of you.

Speech
• The rate and pitch of the speech can be adjusted.
• Option to speak each Word or Character directly while typing.
• Optional highlighting of the spoken words.
• Pause and resume speaking by tapping the speak button (optional setting).

Apple Watch
• The Watch app can especially be useful for communicating short messages.
• On the go, you don't have to pick up your phone and can quicky communicate with the app on your wrist.

Other features
• Button to share your message to mail, text and social media.
• Connect a bluetooth keyboard and create shortcuts for actions.
• A custom keyboard can be enabled in the settings with customizable size, color and layout. 
• Abbreviations expansion to reduce keystrokes.
• Attention sound button on Main and Full screen.
• Option to select symbols from the set of 3400 Mulberry Symbols (mulberrysymbols.org).

About the app
• This app is developed by ASoft.
• The app does not collect any data, so all your conversations stay private.
• One-time payment, there is no subscription fee.
• The app has won an innovation award: The Vodafone Mobiles For Good Challenge.
• The app does not require an internet connection.
• For feedback or questions, please contact: speechassistant@asoft.nl.
• On www.asoft.nl you can find more information such as a user manual.

raw_data.releaseNotes: You can now also select images for buttons with a file picker.

apps.title: Marketspace Communicator
apps.description:
*****
For Customers of Marketspace Communicator.

IMPORTANT: ONLY DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU ARE A CUSTOMER OF MARKETSPACE COMMUNICATOR. 

With the Marketspace Communicator, you can take control of your home or office telephony services from anywhere.
 
FEATURES
• Make and receive calls over WiFi/3G using your landline number
• Move calls between your landline, mobile and tablet devices, without hanging up
• Instant messaging
• Add video to your calls
• Make calls from any phone using your landline caller ID
• Receive new voicemail alerts
• Playback voice and video messages and view faxes
• View transcribed voice messages
• Control how incoming calls are handled
• Sync your Accession contacts across devices
 
NOTE: Your service plan may not include all features listed or may require you to pay additional subscription charges to access certain features. Contact NUSO for information. The Marketspace Communicator also requires data or WiFi access. Use of these services may incur additional charges.

apps.title: TalkU: Unlimited Calls + Texts
apps.description:
Unlimited free calls & texts via WiFi or cellular data, no cell minutes needed, all with the TalkU FREE calling app. Save 90% on international calls and texts. 

With the FREE phone numbers TalkU offers, you can make free WiFi calls & cheap international calls to any phone number over WiFi or cellular data without using any cell minutes and without roaming fees!

Features:
* Free & unlimited calling and texting between TalkU users
* Cheap international calls to over 200 countries worldwide
* Free domestic & international SMS text messaging 
* Turn your iPad & iPod into a phone by installing TalkU
* Get real phone numbers for free
* Add new lines to your phone 

◆ Free WiFi Calls & Text Messages
With TalkU, you can make free calls and send free text messages to any phone number worldwide! Calling & texting between TalkU users are always free!

◆ Cheap International Calls to 200+ Countries Worldwide
√ Call any mobile/landline phone number in over 200 countries
√ Super low rates, save 90% on international calling
√ Stay connected with your family and friends no matter where you are
√Cheap calls to India, Bangladesh, China, USA, Nigeria, UK, Mexico, Brazil, Pakistan, Thailand, UAE, Germany, France, Kuwait, Australia, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines, Egypt, etc.

◆ Free To Call And Text Even With No Phone Available 
When you install TalkU on your iPad or iPod, you are free to call and text. All you need is a WiFi connection and you’re good to go. No cell plan required.

◆ Crystal Clear Phone Calls
With TalkU's high-quality dedicated VoIP network and HD voice technologies, phone calls through TalkU are always clear. Free calls are not low quality anymore! 

◆ Other Awesome Features
Caller ID - Choose a phone number to be displayed when calling
Call Recorder - Record calls for future playback
Call Forwarding - Forward calls to any number you like
Group Calling - Free group conference calls 
Call Block - Stop unwanted calls and fraud calls
Voicemail - Customize your own voicemail greeting
Instant Messaging - Share your photos, videos, contacts & location 
Walkie Talkie - Turn your phone into a Walkie Talkie. Push to talk!

Add any number you want, then call any mobile or landline phone number in over 200 countries, including people who don’t use TalkU.

Note: Unlimited Free SMS, free texts and free international calls are between TalkU users only.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

apps.title: SoftTalk Messenger
apps.description:
SoftTalk Messenger is Nigeria's Messaging App which allows users to Chat, make FREE audio and video calls and shop genuine products and services!

Connect with friends and family using Soft Talk instant messaging, voice calls, or video chats.
Choose a contact from your phone book or simply enter a phone number to add a new contact on Soft Talk messenger. Send a voice note, or take advantage of the other amazing features that Soft Talk offers beyond just free messages! Share photos and videos, enjoy emoji icons, record audio messages, and even send files.

Call Packages!
Free Calls to the US/Canada/UK, Japan, India, Singapore etc
With SoftTalk messenger, You can subscribe to available packages to call mobile and landline for free monthly. Simply select your choice of destinations and start calling mobile direct.. That's it! When you exceed your free monthly subscription, you may purchase credit to call the world.

Premium Calls!
While SoftTalk to SoftTalk Calls are always free, you can call the world with our super low rate tarif to Pakistan, Nigeria, Ghana, India, Nepal, Japan, US/Canada etc, using our Premium route that delivers your exact caller ID to your receiver. Add credit to your wallet to start calling the world right now.

Group chat!
With SoftTalk messenger, it’s easy to create and join group chats - Chat in a group with your favorite people, classmates, family and friends.

Whether you’re looking for a quality brand new or used phone, the longest battery life or accessories, there’s always something for you on SoftTalk Messenger, the first Nigeria’s Messaging app which enables users to not just chat but shop for quality controlled products and services.

Keep Soft Talking, Soft chatting and Soft shopping

apps.title: Skype for Business
apps.description:
Skype for Business, formerly Lync 2013 for iOS, extends the power of Lync and Skype to your favorite mobile device: voice & video over wireless, rich presence, instant messaging, conferencing, and calling features from a single, easy-to-use interface.

Key Features:
Initiate a group IM or video conversation and invite additional participants
Join, rejoin and initiate a Skype for Business Meeting to communicate and collaborate on amazing ideas
Simultaneously view shared content and speaker's video during a conference
Control the meeting (mute or remove attendees) and know more about participants’ modalities
Look at your upcoming meetings and join via one click
Find your recent conversations and pick them up from where you left off
Search your contacts by name, email, or phone number
Enhanced security via Active Directory Authentication Library

apps.title: Vocal Image: AI Voice Coach
apps.description:
Vocal Image — your personal AI communication coach! Transform your voice and interpersonal skills through engaging, bite-sized training sessions that seamlessly integrate into your busy lifestyle.

Whether you're preparing for a job interview, giving a presentation, or simply wanting to sound more confident in daily conversations, Vocal Image helps you speak with clarity and impact in any situation.

————————
WHAT CAN VOCAL IMAGE HELP YOU WITH?

* Professional Communication
Master verbal techniques, communication styles, and strategies that elevate your professional presence.

* Public Speaking & Presentations
Develop a commanding vocal presence for meetings, talks, and on-stage moments.

* Interview Confidence
Improve articulation, tone, and pacing to make a strong impression under pressure.

* Voice Quality Enhancement
Strengthen your speaking voice with targeted, healthy vocal exercises.

* Accent & Pronunciation
Refine pronunciation and reduce accent barriers to speak more clearly, whatever your accent.

* Social Skills & Confidence
Project self-assurance and connect more effectively in everyday conversations.

* Interpersonal Communication
Use tone, pacing, and expression to communicate with clarity and empathy.

————————
HOW VOCAL IMAGE WORKS

* AI Voice Evaluation
Analyze your voice to identify strengths and opportunities, then get personalized recommendations.

* Expert Video Coaching
Practice alongside professional coaches in interactive sessions focused on real-world improvement.

* Personalized Training Plan
Follow a plan tailored to your goals, schedule, and current ability.

* Tongue Twister Drills (Articulation Training)
Listen to professionally recorded tongue twisters, then record your take. Receive instant Clarity and Speed scores and watch them improve over time.

* Daily Radio-Style Lessons
Short, daily audio episodes with evidence-based tips you can apply immediately to speak better—fast.

* Daily Practice Routine
Stay consistent with quick sessions that fit your day, plus streaks and progress tracking.

* Community Feedback
Join 4,000,000+ users and receive constructive feedback on your progress.

* Specialized Programs
Access programs for speech recovery and voice modification, including feminization or masculinization options trusted by the LGBTQ+ community.

————————
SUBSCRIPTION TERMS

After you download the app, you can start a free trial.

Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you’ll be automatically charged the price shown on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. We’ll send a reminder before your trial ends.

Subscriptions renew automatically at the end of each period (weekly, monthly, every 3 months, yearly, or as selected) until you cancel. Canceling stops future renewals; you’ll retain access to all features for the remainder of your current period.

Privacy Policy: https://www.vocalimage.app/privacy
Questions? Contact us: support@vocalimage.app

apps.title: Setera
apps.description:
Setera OneCloud bring cost efficiency and flexibility into communications. 
Setera OneCloud enables an easy to use graphical user-interface that offers a real-time information exchange. Setera OneCloud is at your service no matter what your favourite end-user device is: fixed phone, PC softphone or mobile phone. For the corporate management the solution enables a real-time follow up on the communication expenses, versatile reporting possibilities, easy scalability and cost efficiency. When calling from abroad Setera Cloud solution diverts the call into an incoming call, enabling further cost savings.

apps.title: Vocera Collaboration Suite
apps.description:
Enterprise-class clinical communications including secure messaging

Vocera Collaboration Suite is the industry’s leading enterprise-class, HIPAA compliance enabling voice and secure texting smartphone application that allows you to call by name, group, or broadcast, and integrates with more than 140 clinical systems.  Providing real-time situational awareness and actionable patient data to inform clinical decisions, care team members can easily communicate and collaborate, improving the experience of the patient and caregiver. This solution creates a seamless user experience, combining the unique calling, texting, alerting and content distribution capabilities of Vocera into one, secure and easy-to-use mobile application.

Instantly connecting care teams inside or outside the healthcare facility improves staff productivity, patient safety and the overall care experience. Vocera offers a choice of end-user devices to ensure the continuous flow of critical communication. For those clinicians who rely on smart devices, Vocera Collaboration Suite offers the convenience of voice technology with the security to text critical data, and the functionality to integrate with key clinical alerts and alarms systems.

Key Features: Vocera Collaboration Suite 
•	Support for shared and personal devices to match BYOD policies
•	Functionality inside or outside the facility over Wi-Fi or cellular networks
•	Provides secure and auditable delivery and response reporting for alerts and texts
•	Allows care team members to reach the right person or group at the right time via Active Directory authentication
•	See and interact with Vocera contacts across multiple sites and manage personal favorites lists of users, groups, and global address book entries 
•	Presence and availability indicators
•	Management of critical alarms and messages delivery through on-call scheduling
•	Deliver content such as videos, audio files, documents, spreadsheets, and images securely to devices to ensure critical information is at everyone’s fingertips
•	Permission based access to patient data and care teams with optional access to waveforms and vital signs through integration
•	Eases user transition between the smartphone application and the Vocera Badge when hands-free communication is needed


Vocera System Requirements 
•	Vocera Messaging license 
•	Vocera System software 5.8 (compatible with version 5.3 and higher)
•	Vocera Secure Messaging software 5.8 (compatible with version 5.3 and higher)
•	Vocera Engage software 5.5 for patient data access
•	Vocera Care Team Sync software 2.5.0 for care team data access
•	Vocera SIP Telephony Gateway 
•	Vocera Client Gateway 
•	A Vocera user profile

apps.title: image2talk - functional communication app using real images
apps.description:
“I think image2talk is an easy to use and simple system that could be used successfully  by children and adults with emerging language skills. The instant feedback and the visual nature of the system will help in reducing communication frustration.”
Claudine Ivers, Senior Speech and Language Therapist

image2talk is a simple to use, effective and fully customizable app that enables communication for individuals with whom verbal speech is impaired.

Whether an individual is having difficulty communicating due to autism, stroke or any other communication disorder, image2talk can give that individual the ability to express themselves through the use of images, text and speaker output.  

Suitable for adults and children, straightforward and adaptable customization within image2talk allows for the creation a personal communication tool.

Unique to image2talk is that it completely eliminates the effort of having to navigate through menu or category pages. image2talk is based on the professional experiences of Fiona Wilson, a teacher working with students on the autism spectrum also presenting with general learning disabilities. 

“My brother-in-law was an attorney. A massive stroke stole his words. Losing his words was devastating. Showing him how image2talk worked, including family pictures with names, he touched picture after picture - repeating the word or phrase perfectly. He was never able to remember how to say his wife's or his grandchildrens' names until he had this tool? I added a picture of a heart, typing "I LOVE YOU" for it, shortened the time and now he can say, "I love you, Elaine"!!!  Do you know what a GIFT that is? ”
Judi Smolin, USA

“My daughter is 20 yrs old, moderate/severe Autism and though she can not talk, she does understand what is said to her verbally. She loves the REAL pictures. What I love about the Image2talk App is that it is so EASY to use, easy to change or add pictures, and the voice output is so clearly understood!”
Michele Skoog, Radcliff KY (USA)

* Tap and make images talk
- tap the image - e.g. tap an orange
- the image shows - see an orange on the screen
- speaker output emits response - 'I want an orange'

*Combine standard imagery with your own images
Create your own rows by deleting or reordering standard imagery.  Add your own images via the Camera roll.  Import rows from the gallery or your Dropbox folder.  If required, start off small and build up number of rows and images over time

* Effective time delay - No need to press a back button
Tap an image, image enlarges and after a set time delay the basic overview screen will reappear. If appropriate, the time delay can be increased to give users opportunities to develop speaker and reader skills.

*Features from image2talk
- Tap image – it enlarges and speaks
- Simple overview screen eliminating the need to navigate through category and menu pages
- Basic default rows like food, feelings, etc		
- Easily customize image2talk at source to meet individual needs
- Select gender and accent of voice
- Available in English, Dutch, German, Italian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese and Korean
- Full library available in Dutch and French
- Any text entered can be generated as spoken text
- Import images from Cameral roll
- Save images from the internet, computer or regular camera and import from Dropbox
- Set time delay for basic overview screen to reappear
- Turn text labels on/off
- Turn voice on/off
- Set a PIN to settings to prevent unwanted changes

Fiona Wilson has been teaching students with special needs for over 8 years and prior this taught in mainstream primary schools in Scotland and Ireland.

apps.title: Communication Skill:Talk Maxer
apps.description:
Simulate Conversation

TALK MAXER: MASTER THE ART OF COMMUNICATION: Unleash Your Voice. Perfect Your Speech. Transform Your Connections.

Ever found yourself stumbling through important conversations, filling awkward silences with "um" and "uh," or struggling to find the right words when it matters most? Talk Maxer is your personal AI communication coach, designed to transform how you speak—and how others perceive you.

YOUR POCKET COMMUNICATION COACH
Talk Maxer uses advanced speech recognition technology to help you practice real-world conversations in a judgment-free environment. Simply tap to talk, and our AI responds naturally, creating dynamic practice sessions that feel like genuine interactions. Whether you're preparing for a job interview, practicing asking someone out, or just wanting to sound more confident at social gatherings, Talk Maxer is your secret advantage.

PRACTICE ANYWHERE, ANYTIME
With Talk Maxer, you can:
• Master Daily Life Communication: Navigate grocery stores, restaurants, doctor's offices, banks, and more with clear, confident speech patterns.
• Develop Charisma and Romance Skills: From breaking the ice at first meetings to maintaining long-term relationships, learn to express yourself authentically and charmingly.
• Enhance Social Communication: Practice telling engaging stories, resolving conflicts, delivering presentations, and shining in group settings.
• Eliminate Filler Words: Our intelligent system detects and helps you reduce those pesky "ums," "ahs," and "likes" that diminish your verbal impact.
• Track Your Progress: Our intuitive analytics dashboard shows your improvement over time, providing daily scores and highlighting areas for growth.

REAL-WORLD SCENARIOS, REAL RESULTS
Each lesson plan is carefully crafted to simulate authentic interactions you'll encounter in everyday life. Our AI responds dynamically to your speech patterns, word choices, and conversational approach, providing personalized feedback that helps you refine your communication style.

BACKED BY COMMUNICATION SCIENCE
Talk Maxer isn't just another practice app—it's built on proven communication principles and techniques used by professional speech coaches. We've studied what makes great communicators stand out and distilled those insights into practical exercises you can use immediately.

PREMIUM FEATURES THAT TRANSFORM HOW YOU SPEAK
Upgrade to Premium for the full Talk Maxer experience:
• Unlimited access to all lesson categories and specialized scenarios
• Advanced analytics and progress tracking
• Personalized feedback on tone, pace, and clarity
• No ads for uninterrupted practice sessions

Whether you're a professional looking to advance your career, a student preparing for presentations, or someone who simply wants to communicate more effectively in personal relationships, Talk Maxer provides the practice, feedback, and confidence you need to become a masterful communicator.
Download Talk Maxer today and transform how you speak—and how the world responds to you.

apps.title: LetterMe: Send Virtual Letters
apps.description:
LetterMe is a non-instant communication app that brings the experience of letter-sending to modern times.

Delivery time depends on the physical distance between sender and receiver, making each interaction special.

The goal is to provide a slower communication channel where people can have more meaningful conversations without the need to reply instantly.

Key features:

• You'll get a notification when someone sends you a letter, but you won't know their identity until it arrives.

• Customize Your Letters: Say goodbye to plain text – choose your preferred font and paper color to make your letters feel more special.

• Track your letters and watch them travel across the world until they reach their destination.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using LetterMe! We update the app regularly to bring you the best possible experience. In this version, we’ve made the following changes:


• LetterMe Premium is now live!
• Brand new letter view.
• Improved onboarding flow.

apps.title: RedeApp: Work + Communities
apps.description:
RedeApp: The Mobile Work + Communities Platform

Welcome to business class communication that's free for everyone. RedeApp brings professional-grade messaging and collaboration to organizations of any size—from local clubs to global enterprises.

Stop running your team on apps meant for vacation photos. RedeApp gives you a dedicated, secure space where important information never gets buried.

RedeApp GO - Free, Forever: Create your professional network with Communities, messaging, file sharing, and App Hub integration. Easily organize team communications and access essential tools—all with base security features included. Perfect for teams and organizations of any size.

RedeApp PLUS - For Growing Organizations: Everything in GO, plus enhanced operational features including shifts management, smart messaging, Shelbe AI Assistant, and core analytics. Designed for growing organizations that need more coordination tools.

RedeApp PRO - Enterprise Solutions: Our complete enterprise suite with advanced analytics, custom forms and workflows, SSO, enterprise compliance features, and full administrative control for maximum flexibility and security.

What Our Users Say: "RedeApp provided a huge boost to our information sharing and efficiency. It helps us maintain our culture of safety because issues can be addressed before they happen." – Construction Industry

"A communication failure can cost us thousands of dollars per hour. Now we can send a single message and reach everyone in seconds instead of making individual calls." – Paving & Construction Industry

"The HIPAA compliance allows us to share protected health information securely, unlike other messaging options. Our field staff check RedeApp more frequently than email." – Healthcare Industry

"It's an all-in-one platform for everything needed for company cohesion. Our operation has changed for the better because of this platform." – Supply Chain Industry

About RedeApp 

RedeApp is the only business class communication platform built for your mobile team, community, club, or organization. Whether you're managing a local business or a multi-location enterprise, RedeApp connects everyone, everywhere.

apps.title: Psychology: Body Language
apps.description:
Discover the untold truths that lie beneath spoken words with our groundbreaking app. 
In a world where verbal messages can be carefully crafted, nonverbal signals often reveal the unfiltered reality. 
Unleashing the power of body language, our app provides you with invaluable insights into the realm of uncontrolled reactions.
Unlock the secrets of eye movements, hand gestures, leg positions, body postures, and an array of other captivating nonverbal cues.
Gain a deep understanding of the nuances and hidden meanings behind each gesture. 
Empower yourself with the ability to decipher unspoken conversations and uncover the deeper truths that lie within.
But that's not all—this app is your personal knowledge bank. Take notes, compile your observations, and create your own comprehensive library of body language knowledge. With every interaction, you'll enhance your expertise and sharpen your skills in decoding the intricate language of the human body.
Uncover the unspoken, unlock the truth, and master the art of body language with our revolutionary app. Embark on a journey of discovery and revelation today!

apps.title: LINE WORKS: Team Communication
apps.description:
Each company, organization, or team can register and use LINE WORKS, and the first person to start LINE WORKS can add/invite members to start communication.

With LINE WORKS, people of different generations and IT experience can communicate more smoothly, regardless of the size of the company, the type of industry, or the type of job!!
 
■ RECOMMENDED FOR SUCH ORGANIZATIONS AND GROUPS
- For people who want to keep their work and private lives separate.
- For organizations that want their employees to communicate smoothly regardless of where they are at.
- For people who want to communicate more quickly than by email or phone.
- For people who need to eliminate omissions in business communications and easily announce notices.
 
■ HOW TO START
First, add someone close to you at work or in your group to LINE WORKS and let's get started!

1. Starting a Talk Session
Try out the basic functions such as sending messages and photos, voice and video calls, and more!

2. Use different functions
In addition to talk, there are a variety of other functions that are useful for work.
 
[Board] You can post a message to your entire department or organization. You can also check the read status of your own postings to prevent omissions.
[Calendar] You can check the free time of meeting participants and easily grasp the schedules of members.
[Task] You can select the requestor and the person in charge, set the deadline, and easily create tasks from the content of the talk.
[Form] You can easily create and distribute various types of surveys from your mobile device.
[Contact] The address book is always linked to the organization structure, so you can see the members at a glance even when they change jobs or form a team.
[Mail] You can use useful business functions such as read receipts and reminders, and more. (Basic plan and above)
[Drive] Manage your files safely and efficiently with online storage. (Basic Plan and above)

 3. Expand the scope of use
Once you've tried it out, consider expanding its use from teams to departments, and from departments to the entire organization.
The free plan can be used by up to 100 people at no cost.
 
■ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
 Q. With LINE WORKS, can I automatically connect with the people I am already friends with on LINE? 
A. No, LINE WORKS will NOT be linked to your existing LINE user account or friend list. The "Start with LINE Account" and "Login with LINE" functions allow you to use your LINE account in place of your login ID and password. This is a convenient feature for people who are not confident enough to remember their ID and password. 

Contact us at
https://line-works.com/en/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixed “Today” widget display issue
- Fixed notifications for mentions in the body of a note
- Fixed Text Input issue for the body of a note
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: MyKalahari - by Kalahari
apps.description:
Kalahari - The social platform for our organization: for employees and external partners

Kalahari is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. Consisting of timelines, news feeds and chat features, similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal successes quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Convenient, especially if you do not work behind a desk. 

The benefits of Kalahari
- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share successes
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time by reducing e-mail and find what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Feature list:
- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- messages
- News
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications

apps.title: Ommnio
apps.description:
Ommnio is instant messaging technology to communicate with ALL employees, particularly with those that are “deskless”, because they do not work in front of a computer. Since most employees do not have a corporate device, Ommnio connects teams with their personal mobile phones, while protecting their privacy and leisure time. 

Push notifications are only sent while working, protecting each team member time. And everybody can connect and discuss professional matters without sharing their personal phone numbers. 

Companies are putting at risk their GDPR compliance when using WhatsApp with their employees. These teams are not only publicly sharing their personal phone number with workmates, they are also being bothered with push notifications round the clock. Ommnio is meant to be as easy as any instant messaging app, but protecting privacy and leisure time. Ommnio is ideal for people working in healthcare, facility services, retail, transportation or hospitality, among others. 

People in offices have e-mails. Deskless workers now have Ommnio: a respectful, safe and corporate communication tool. You can use Ommnio both on your cellphone or on a web browser.

apps.title: Berkanan Messenger
apps.description:
Berkanan is what people nearby are talking about right now. Join the conversation. Discover interesting people. From festivals to conferences and college campuses, Berkanan is there.

Berkanan is a Bluetooth-powered group messaging app. It gives people a way to communicate in situations with poor or no cellular connectivity. Alongside group messaging, Berkanan also allows private one-to-one encrypted messaging. The range for these messages is about 70 meters, but if there are people between you and your intended recipient with the app installed, Berkanan can send messages further by going through other users' devices.

FEATURES
• Nearby Messaging: Chat with people nearby. Send public and private messages.
• P2P: Messages travel from device to device.
• Offline: Works offline, only with Bluetooth. No need for Wi-Fi or cellular connectivity.
• Notifications: Works in the background. Get notified of nearby users and messages.
• No Account: Use it without the need to register for an account.

PREMIUM FEATURES
• Edit Profile: Add personality to your profile.
• Turn Off Ads

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. Offers and pricing subject to change without notice.

Terms of Use: https://berkanan.chat/terms
Privacy Policy: https://berkanan.chat/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Fixes an issue that could cause users not to appear in Nearby. Thank you, Michael!
• Fixes an issue that caused the user private message notification content extension's height to shrink after being displayed.

Love using the app? Invite your friends! Rate us!

apps.title: SpeakPet: Animal Communicator
apps.description:
SpeakPet: Animal Communicator

Imagine a world where the joy of pet ownership meets limitless creativity—welcome to SpeakPet: Animal Communicator, an immersive experience that redefines digital companionship. This isn't just another pet game; it's a dynamic universe where every interaction strengthens your bond with a truly responsive virtual companion.

A New Era of Pet Ownership
From the moment you meet your pet, you'll be amazed by its vibrant personality and ability to connect. Watch with pride as your companion masters new skills through our revolutionary clicker training system—a scientifically inspired feature that makes every training session rewarding. The more you interact, the more your pet's intelligence and abilities flourish, creating a genuinely evolving relationship.

Hear the Magic of Connection
Experience the comforting purr of a contented feline, the excited yip of a playful pup, or even the majestic roar of exotic creatures. These authentic vocalizations do more than entertain—they create meaningful communication between you and your friend.

A Journey of Discovery
Explore different breeds and species, and uncover fascinating real-world animal facts and care tips curated by veterinary experts.

Free Features:
Basic virtual pet interaction
Introductory clicker training tool
Limited animal sound selection

Premium Features (Require Subscription):
Full access to the clicker
Complete library of animal sounds

Annual Sub

apps.title: Purple Bureau Communication
apps.description:
Purple Bureau is a communication & HR SaaS mobile application that will help you & your employees enjoying an exceptional new experience that ensures effective communication & engagement. 


*Employees listing 
*Chatting 
*Serious gaming 
*Vacations requests
*Sales force Tracking 
*Shared Calendars 
*Mobile Attendance Signature 
*Notifications 
*Etc.. 
We wish you a great experience with Purple Bureau and excited to receive your requests and feedback on support@purplebureau.com

You can easily achieve this in just 4 very simple steps:
1- Start your Purple Bureau HR SAAS.
2- Pick the package that best suits you.
3- Be heard and add value.
4- Evaluate effectiveness of your app.

A lot of companies are lacking smooth interaction between its employees. Communication is a major hinder to the advancement of the companies worldwide. We have decided to create a tool that becomes the business Swiss knife of the employees and management to better collaborate and be informed. 

The main application objective will be:
1-	Smooth communication between employees with a guarantee of flow of information between the management and the employees from two side. This will cover company news, employees news, simple messaging, vacation request, salary notification, etc..

2-	The retention of the employees. The application should add some activities that will help the employees enjoying their existence in the company. Few tools will exists to challenge group context between the employees. We want to make the employees better at their place by raising their loyalty. Once the employees like the place they will, consequently, stay longer in the company. We have added Trivia gaming and chatting rooms for the employees excitement.

a.Top 10 scored of the business games
b.Vacation Rate/ per month 
c. Casual vacation rate/ per month 
d.Turnover rate. 
e. Etc….

apps.title: GroupTalk Push to Talk
apps.description:
GroupTalk is a powerful push-to-talk (PTT) app designed for enterprise and business communication. 
It offers fast, efficient, and cost-effective group voice communication for instant PTT calls. 
Compatible with smartphones, computers, tablets, and traditional two-way radios, GroupTalk ensures seamless connectivity across platforms.
Easily manage all users and talk groups through the centralized web-based GroupTalk Admin.
Use GroupTalk for work teams, emergency responders, security teams, logistics, and more to experience high-quality, secure voice communication, regardless of location.

Key Features:

* Instant group voice communication (PTT)
* Private and group calls for flexible communication
* Crystal clear audio quality
* Works over WiFi and 4G / 5G networks
* Very long standby time for ongoing connectivity
* High-security encryption and two-factor authentication (2FA) for peace of mind
* Support for Bluetooth remote speaker microphones and PTT buttons
* Bluetooth 4.0 (Low Energy) for minimal battery usage

GroupTalk Benefits:

* Ideal for teams that need instant voice communication
* Scalable for small to large enterprises, security teams, and fieldwork
* Simple deployment, no complex setup needed
* Use it with existing two-way radios or upgrade to smart devices
* Manage and monitor user groups with ease through a web-based dispatcher

Why Choose GroupTalk? 

Whether you need a reliable PTT app for work, team communication, or to connect field workers, GroupTalk offers a secure, scalable solution.
Trusted by industries like security, construction, logistics, and emergency services, GroupTalk helps you stay connected with instant push-to-talk communication from anywhere.

NOTE:
A GroupTalk account is required to use the app.
Contact us at info@grouptalk.com or sign upp for a free trial https://grouptalk.com/getting-started

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Fixed support so no-group is supported in toggle group feature.
• Fixed an issue where full-duplex could malfunction after an external call.
• Fixed an issue where the shortcut page indicator could display the wrong number of pages when rotating the screen.
• Added emergency button statusbar in landscape mode.

apps.title: Apptoto Communicator
apps.description:
Apptoto is a fully customizable appointment messaging platform that connects to your existing calendar and address book, finds contact information, and can send Text, Voice, and Email messages before and after appointments.  It is mainly used to reduce no-shows by up to 90% with automated reminders, but can also be used to send follow-ups, schedule appointments, carry on two-way conversations with new and existing clients, and improve client communication overall!

Over 3,000 companies trust Apptoto to reduce no-shows, keep their appointments informed, and streamline scheduling.

An Apptoto account is required before logging into the app.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Fixes memory leaks that could potentially lead to performance degredation
2. Fixes bug where tapping on push notifications wouldn't always take you to conversation

Statement enables you to easily communicate in-person when you can't talk out loud.  Whether you're at a noisy concert, in a quiet classroom, or have trouble speaking, simply type your message and turn your phone around.

- Save phrases for quick reuse
- Helvetica font for maximum readability
- High contrast with dark background

apps.title: Yapster - chat for teams
apps.description:
Yapster is a full-integrated mobile communications platform, designed for frontline colleagues who don’t have company email addresses. 

●	Download for free and login to join your work colleagues.
●	Find all colleagues across the organisation and chat to them within minutes.
●	Stay up to date with company news with the feed
●	Get notified when colleagues post in your conversations
●	Update your profile and customise your notification settings.

When logging in for the first time, use either your work email (if you have one) or the personal email address you have on record at your organisation.

Yapster is a registered trademark in the United Kingdom.

apps.title: Avaya Workplace
apps.description:
Avaya Workplace integrates your iPhone and iPad with your office Avaya Aura or IP Office communications environment and delivers mobile voice & video VoIP calling, rich conferencing, instant messaging, presence, visual voicemail, corporate directory access, call history and more!

Key Capabilities (Feature availability will vary based on your environment and configured services)

· VoIP calls – Lower your mobile service charges by making VoIP calls over Wi-Fi or mobile data networks
· Conceal Your Mobile Phone Number - Calls made with Avaya Workplace are handled by your office communication system and will display your office calling line ID, not your mobile phone number
· Cellular Voice integration – If VoIP isn’t your best option, then traditional cellular voice service can be used and calls will still be routed through your office communication system
· Call Mobility – VoIP roaming between Wi-Fi and 3/4G networks, and call handoff between cellular voice and VoIP
· Single Number Contact – Choose to have incoming office calls ring on your iPhone and/or any other phone you may want to use
· Visual voicemail – Enables you to see who left you a voice message and when it arrived. Messages can be played in any order.
· Instant Messaging – Exchange text messages and multi-media file attachments with archival/retrieval
· Presence status – View the Presence status of colleagues
· 24X7 call logs shows all office line call activity regardless of which device was used or when calls arrived
· Corporate Directory Integration – Search for corporate contacts and create a list of favorites
· Integrated audio / video / web conferencing with Avaya Workplace Meetings Online and Avaya Workplace Conferencing

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Enhanced UCID (Universal Call Identifier) support.
Enable/Disable screens for EULA, Emergency disclaimer and Tutorial
Apply dialing rules to calls dialed from Call logs- Controlled through config property.
Allow users to see the typed password by providing 'eye' icon

apps.title: Tango Networks Communicator
apps.description:
Welcome to the Tango Networks Communicator, where the power of your corporate desk phone is made available on your mobile. The app works in conjunction with Tango Networks’ Hosted or on-premises Accelerator server software providing unique mobile voice and message features for businesses. Please contact your company’s IT administrator for account and connectivity information.

The Tango Networks Communicator offers: 

Short Code Dialing: Can't remember your colleague's complete desk phone number while out of the office. From your mobile, simply dial the short code as you would in the office from your desk phone.

Identity Management: Want to present  your enterprise number to your colleagues and external business clients and your mobile number to personal friends and family members while using the app? Set up server policy rules to determine just that.  Or if you like, on a call by call basis, make that selection, prior to making the call, through the touch of a button 

Policy Rules: Choose which set of server side policy rules are active. Is your boss bothering you while on your day off? An ‘out of office, do not disturb’ policy can take care of that. 

Corporate Directory Lookup: Need to reach someone within your company but do not remember their number? Search your company’s corporate directory and place a call, or email them directly from the app.

VoIP Calling: Out of minutes or traveling overseas? Utilize the app’s built in Voice over WiFi/3G/4G capability to place and receive calls on the data network, bypassing voice minutes of use.* 


We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, please email us at: support@tango-networks.com

Need help? support@tango-networks.com

Legal:
*Operator data charges may apply.
*This App is based on Linphone which is licensed under GNU GPL v3 (http://www.linphone.org)

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Change of messaging interface to HTTP for newer servers.
Minor fix for url scheme support.
